When Dr Renfroe came in to visit me, I knew the way he communicated with me about my dental health and what my next steps were, I knew he would take great care of me, and he totally has! They have transformed my smile and health! Fast forward to now, my dental health is much better and I’m way more proud of my smile! Not only was I so impressed with this dental practice that I have maintained my dental visits, but I also was so inspired by this team that I joined the team and am now currently a dental assistant with Wall Street! Dianna has been training me everything she knows, and has made working here such a pleasure! Talk about great first impressions that last! When I’m here I feel like family ❤️ 🦷

text: This place is absolutely amazing! Everyone you meet from the time you walk through the door until you leave is very friendly and makes you feel so comfortable. Dr. B is the BEST! name: Heather Hollis
text:
I went here for a free treatment plan for new patient 2 years ago, I was given a two-page treatment plan, there were a lot of things on there I did not need and a bunch of teeth listed on there that had no problems at all ...

Then a couple months ago I went to Complete Dental and got a treatment plan, literally one page with nine teeth listed, minimum treatment at that.. they were accurate and did not list teeth that had no problems in order to fraudulently charged people with no insurance.. I'm sticking with Complete Dental from now on and I won't be going back to Aspen that's for sure. I mean Aspen had Dental code d4341 which is periodontal scaling and root planning 4 plus teeth, listed four times for each section of my mouth... I did not need scaling and replanting at all at the other place. Another thing that really made me mad was that the teeth they x-rayed 2 years ago and Aspen dental, there's a bunch of three surface composite d2393 codes listed and at complete dental, none of these teeth were listed as teeth with cavities. I examined my x-ray from both places and Aspen was really trying to charge me for teeth that had no problems. I just don't know why they do that... That makes people not want to return.

Complete Dental listed 10 items on my treatment plan, x-ray taking last month.. Aspen Dental listed 35 items on a treatment plan that was taken 2 years ago from today. You tell me who you would choose

resp.text: Thank you for being in touch, Heather. The well-being of our patients is our priority, and we value your feedback. We will share your thoughts with our teams with an eye to always do what we can to improve the patient experience. This is not the experience we want for our patients. If at any point now or in the future you would also like to speak with our Patient Satisfaction team, their direct phone number is 1-866-767-0890. Be well. - Cindy ADMI

name: Brandy Gipson
text: Dr. Ross was absolutely fantastic!! I was so nervous going in but the sweet lady at the front desk talked to me and told me that I would be in good hands. Well she was absolutely right!! I appreciate all the team that helped me! I HIGHLY recommend Dr. Ross to everyone!! I had a tooth pulled and it is the next day and I'm in absolutely no pain. There is tenderness of course but no pain! I did pray before going in. Thank you heavenly Father for sending me a great dentist and for helping me be pain free!

resp.text: Thank you, Brandy, for saying you will recommend us. This is the highest form of appreciation, from our patients, that we receive! We take patient satisfaction very seriously, thanks again. - Cindy, ADMI

name: M Hammer
text: I scheduled an appointment because I had a broken tooth and they were the primary dentist listed by my insurance. They initially took a regular set of x-rays, looked at them and without explanation proceeded t I take a series of x-rays of every tooth.i was informed that my gums needed a deep cleaning and scraping.and without it my teeth were all going to fall out. They also wanted to do root canal, 2 or three crowns all of which came to $6000 after insurance. They said they could do nothing until I had cleaning and did nothing for broken tooth. I left- never going back.

resp.text: I'm really sorry to hear that, M Hammer. If you haven't called the Patient Satisfaction team yet, my team would appreciate the opportunity to talk to you: 1-866-767-0890. - Cindy, ADMI

name: Larry Jackson
text: They just sent me a text to reschedule the day before I was to go.  I was going for an initial appointment for a root canal.  The lady on the phone admitted they don't even have endodontists, which was why I scheduled with them to begin with.  This was confirmed when I set the appointment.  They wanted to schedule me another month out, due to employees leaving.  I just said never mind I'll find someone else to do it.  The lady without any hesitation hung up on me.  They also never returned any of my three messages.  This is NOT the way to do business.  I'll never try them again, regardless of whether they are in network providers or not.

resp.text: I'm really sorry to hear this, Larry. If you haven't called the Patient Satisfaction team yet, they would appreciate the opportunity to talk to you about this experience: 1-866-767-0890. - Krista, ADMI

name: Alison
text: I really liked the dentist that looked at me but I feel like Aspen is more concerned with upselling their patients than the patient’s overall dental health.  They said I needed a special kind of deep cleaning instead of just a normal cleaning which is fine and great until I was informed that the special deep cleaning was going to cost me over me $200! With my dental insurance 2 cleanings and X-rays are included with my dental insurance at no cost to me as preventive care.  When the dentist told me that she wanted me to get a special kind deep cleaning I figured it was covered under one of my cleanings.  I had no idea that particular cleaning was going to cost me over $200.  So when the office manager made me aware that when I came back in for that kind of cleaning I would need to be prepared to pay over $200 because it wasn’t considered preventive care but basic care because it was a deep cleaning.  I told her that wasn’t explained to me an I wanted to change my treatment plan back to just a normal cleaning.  The office manger said that the treatment plan couldn’t be changed without the dentist approval so she went an asked the dentist.  The dentist refused to change the treatment plan to just a normal cleaning.  At first I thought well maybe I am in need of the special kind of deep cleaning until I sought a second opinion from someone in the periodontal field and they informed me that a normal cleaning would suffice just fine.  So, with that being said I feel like they were trying to upsell me especially since they refused to do any kind of cleaning unless I agreed to pay over $200 for the deep clean! I had to make another appointment with another dentist so I could get the care I need.  More of my time spent on something I had already done.  This whole situation stinks and should be unacceptable!  Dental health is so expensive and stuff like this just makes it more difficult!  Aspen Dental and some of the other companies like them have a reputation for this but I was still willing to give them a chance. Unfortunately, the reputation that proceeds them was proven to be right!

resp.text: Thank you for being in touch, Alison. The well-being of our patients is our priority, and we value your feedback. We will share your thoughts with our teams with an eye to always do what we can to improve the patient experience. This is not the experience we want for our patients. If at any point now or in the future you would also like to speak with our Patient Satisfaction team, their direct phone number is 1-866-767-0890. Be well. - Cindy ADMI

name: Sherry Huckaba
text: I was thinking the quote they gave me was for my dentures were both top and bottom, but was told after 4 months that my bottoms were going to cost  me over 4000.00 and I still paying on my dental card  for what I thought was for both.i left there almost in tears .because know I have to do without my full set of dentures until I can afford get them hopefully I can someone that's cheaper or can work on payment..just wished I had been told that it was for both ,and I had asked was that price for both and was assured it was ..

name: Tim McCarley
text: 10 days to get an emergency appointment then they rescheduled.  Took X-rays turned out if they had just looked at my record with them they would have prescribed meds and made a referral to another doctor who is more capable but  no.  Doctor never looked at me only X-rays.  Does not know how to provide IRS formatted statements for FSA payments after repeatedly asking for the correct documentation.  Bottom line workers are nice, doctors are rentals who may not be there the next time and don’t seem to care.  I’ve spent $2700 out of pocket over the year with other dependents care with Aspen.I come in with an emergency tooth pain which can be saved but all they could do was extract it. Without sedation. And no pain meds till antibiotics have took care of the infection Love those options.  Done with it. Now my tooth and my but huts and they got paid for nothing.  It might be convenient but it’s not the level of service you should expect when you are basically bringing them insurance that pays well and they get theres but you might find yourself in the same shape as when you walked in.  Buyer beware

resp.text: I am so sorry Tim, this was not the experience we want for our patients. If you haven't called the Patient Satisfaction team yet, my team would appreciate the opportunity to talk to you: 1-866-767-0890. - Cindy, ADMI

name: Joey Wise
text:
This place was not for me
My insurance covers for x-rays and for dental cleanings twice to year 12 years I've been going to Monrovia family dentist I've never been charged and aspen dental just charged 253 said insurance wouldn't cover it because it's a peredontal cleaning I said well I would just like to have a regular cleaning  and they refused to do a regular cleaning and said I would have to pay for that and they were charging me in advance for it and not seeing  me till next week so after I paid for everything I turned around and canceled it and got a refund
They done this to a friend of mine as we went together
His was 217 paid in advanced
Got it canceled
Guess I will continue to go all the way out to Monrovia  I was hoping to be able to use this insurance as they accept it and I'm 2 streets over from this place. This place is more or less a place to process people in as fast as they can charge what they can get out of you and then send you out the door don't even do the work the same day set you up for a different day

text: Everyone is very pleasant and professional

name: Emily Baugher
text: The staff at Aspen Dental are so nice and caring.  The honestly care about your needs and make sure they do everything they can to meet them. They listen to you and make sure to explain everything about your dental care. Dr. Ross is amazing and I would recommend the Decatur office to anyone.

resp.text: That's wonderful to hear, Emily. I'm so glad that the team has made it a positive experience for you! - EF, ADMI

name: Jeff Gilbreath
text: They really do care and try their best to keep costs down. For a firm that sees so many patients, that is rare.

resp.text: I'm happy to hear that, Jeff. Thanks for sharing! - Dawn, ADMI

name: Linda parker
text: I was very disappointed. They said I needed $1800 of dental work. Had to pay $386 for a partial cleaning. I got checked buy another  Dentist without telling him l had been to Aspen. All I needed was a cleaning. He even had to clean what Aspen had already cleaned. He only charged $75.

resp.text: I'm really sorry to hear that, Linda. If you haven't called the Patient Satisfaction team yet, my team would appreciate the opportunity to talk to you: 1-866-767-0890. - Dawn, ADMI

name: Jeckel Nunya
text:
Absolute nightmare!  The office manager Brady is awful.  He acts like giving out any information is illegal.  I have never had such issues trying to obtain information about the simplest dental questions!  Aspen Dental Decatur is not going to get my business.  That man should be FIRED.

Edit to respond to message below - I DID call yesterday and left a message.  Dawn called me back, promised that she would have more information for me by 3:30 yesterday.  NO CALL as of today.

Now I am being told that I must have additional work done before they can start on the procedure we discussed.  I was in that office for three hours and no one mentioned that.

resp.text: I am sorry you did not have a positive experience; We would really like to speak with you about it.  Will you please call us at 1-866-767-0890 Thank you! ADMI

name: Cyndi Kovach
text: The staff was friendly and knowledgeable. The service was great. The office manager helped me determine a treatment plan considering my insurance coverage and my personal financial capabilities. Very helpful!

resp.text: I'm happy to hear this, Cindi. It’s so great to hear this about the team, and I hope that you continue to have 5-star experiences. — Dawn, ADMI

name: Bruce Hillyard
text: Loved it. She had small hands and I liked that. Aspen Dental (Great place)

resp.text: I'm glad you enjoyed your visit, Bruce. Patient satisfaction is very important to Aspen Dental practices, and it's great to hear that the team helped you have a 5-star experience. - Dawn, ADMI

name: Denis Opsteegh
text: Very professional, have great people and very informative about what needs to help you. Would recommend them.

text: What a great experience! I needed dental clearance for up coming surgery & they checked off all the boxes. Aspen Dental will be my dentist from now on!

text: All the staff members were very nice and they welcome me in Their service was awesome and the Dr. Was Great

text: Didn't like the long times between people seeing me.

I will pass this along to the team, but please don't hesitate to reach out to them to discuss any questions or concerns you have about your treatment plan. - Cindy, ADMI

name: Grace A Fugate
text: I would never go again. They do not work together to communicate as a team. Too commercialized for their own good. Walked in for a cleaning and walked out with a 20,000 estimate and no work done. Got 3 different opinions while there. Dentist looked to be early 20"s and seemed to know more than anyone else there.

resp.text: I'm sorry to hear that, Grace. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us so that we can continue to improve patient experiences. - Julie, ADMI

name: Angie Villafane
text: Normally I'm terrified of going to the dentist. It's really the only place that scares me to death. The staff was so kind and really went out of their way to make me feel at ease. I had put off going for too long because of my fears. Dr Ross was so nice and funny. Shes extremely good at giving the shots. I didn't even feel them at all. I had prepared myself for the worse. It never happened. I broke my tooth months back and I just couldn't bring myself to go. So I got the courage up to go and it turned out I just needed a filling. Thank you Decatur Alabama Aspen Dental for being a dentist office i can truly tell everyone about being absolutely great and meaning it 100%.

resp.text: It's so nice to hear this, Angie. I'm glad you felt at ease and were able to make your oral health a priority despite your fears. - Emily, ADMI

name: Corey Tolbert
text: Office manager had a very poor attitude and was slightly rude and dismissive. Will see another dentist

text: The staff was truly kind. They exceeded my expectations. I recommend this office to anyone who needs a caring dentist and staff. Thank you so much for taking care of me and answering all my questions.

Not only did they care about the condition I was in, they treated me professionally yet cordially and it really shows in their practice. I’m looking forward to my next visit.

name: Melissa McMunn
text: Everyone was wonderful!  They had amazing patients with my mother who has dementia.  Office is very neat and clean,  very organized.  I can't wait to go back and get my mom's new dentures and partial for bottom teeth.  I love this place.  They go above and beyond there duties and explain everything which is easy to understand.  I would recommend Aspen Dental to anyone looking for a dentist.  😁🤗

name: Kay Hyde
text: They are a rip-off tell you one price and then come back charge you $$$. More.  Don't go here ! I called the better business bureau   They took my complaint and told me to call dental board on them.  I ask anyone else to do the same that got told one price and then owed lots more.

text: Dr. Pruitt and Claire were extremely friendly. Dr. Pruitt identified exactly what dental work I would need in no time. He was able to fix my teeth to make them look more even and natural. The results were amazing and I could immediately tell the difference. This has been the best experience I have ever had at a dentist by far! Highly recommend.

text: The staff was very kind and professional, and made me feel very comfortable.

name: Reginald Priest
text: They were very nice and none intimidating, very Informative  and made me feel excited. That was a year ago. Now this year the real truth. Ok I had insurance all i wanted was a cleaning and counsel on future services.  Well they talked me into financing this upgrade on my teeth it was gonna cost me almost 10,000.00 dollars. I signed and payed my monthly payments,   the office closed for Corona virus so reschedule over and over again because the virus and work schedule  after the third reschedule they told me they could no longer see me still the financing company wanted payments. It was a awful experience.  Dont go there. Go to a local privately owned dentist.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing, Reginald! I am happy to hear of your great experience. The office will be so happy to read this. — Dawn, ADMI

name: Nick Anderson
text: I cannot say enough about this crew! My last experience at a different dental office was HORRIBLE and they worked so hard to make me comfortable going to the dentist again. text: Great experience! Friendly and knowledgeable staff. Appointment was on time and fast even though the exam was far more extensive than any other I've had at other dentist. The insurance people were also great to work with, but I cant remember their names!  😁

text: I have nothing negative to say about my visit to Aspen Dental of Decatur. The staff was friendly and accommodating. They were very informative and helpful. name: Dena Moody
text: So far their service has been excellent. Front desk had answered all my questions even when I called 5 minutes after leaving the office. I am terrified of dentist, but Dr. Narissa Ross was very friendly and professional. I had 10 teeth pulled at the same time and she made it as painless as possible. All of the assistant's in the office was very nice. They always had a smile. I would recommend them to anyone who needed dental service.

resp.text: That's so nice to hear, Dena. It’s great that you felt at ease with the team, and I hope that you continue to have 5-star experiences. - Emily, ADMI

name: Kenneth Clayton
text: They were very friendly and professional

name: Shirley Bates
text: Very nice & polite. Showing they care about you and was very helpful to me.

resp.text: I'm glad you enjoyed your visit, Shirley. Thanks for sharing! - Emily, ADMI

name: Jacob Hanley
text: HORRIBLE!!! I came in for a cleaning (First Visit) and they took x-rays. After waiting around 30 minutes after receiving x-rays, they came in and informed me that my teeth looked great with ZERO cavities. The lady who cleans teeth came in and looked at my teeth and said that I had some kind of bacteria (I don't know how in the world you can determine by looking at teeth what kind of bacteria they have without placing under a microscope). I said okay when can you clean my teeth? She said she would be right back that she would get it set up. While waiting patiently, I hear her in another room telling someone else they have the same kind of bacteria and would need advance cleaning. After waiting they informed me that my teeth would need an advance cleaning and it would cost $281 to have my teeth cleaned after my insurance (MY INSURANCE COVERS 100% of basic care including cleanings). Basically, for first appointments and cleanings, they tell all of their patients the same thing to try and drag as much money out as possible. After this I was not going to post a review, but I decided to go with another dentist and have called them 5 times to have my x-rays emailed, but they keep insisting that they have emailed them, but have not. They are completely dishonest and are trying to charge almost $300 for a teeth cleaning that shouldn't be over $50-$100. Please save your money and go somewhere else. I asked, "Can I not just receive a regular teeth cleaning that my insurance company covers?". They explained company policy that they are not allowed to give regular teeth cleanings for first visits, so basically they lie and tell everyone they have some kind of bacteria. PLEASE SAVE YOURSELF TIME AND MONEY AND GO SOMEWHERE ELSE

resp.text:
Jacob,
Thank you for providing this information.  I would really like to speak with you.  Will you please call me at (844) 296-0187 ext. 201152 — Julie, ADMI

name: Kimberly Rivers
text: The hygienist was superior. Dr. Ross excellent.    I only have one complaint.  Aspen does not offer the nitrous oxide.  For a person like me this makes a big difference

name: Randy Harrod
text: Super nice people! Very friendly and they encouraged me to relax as they review what is in my best interest, to correct various problems with my teeth! Unfortunately, my severe gag reflex, will not let me continue with this caring group of people! But Dr. Ross searched a local dentist, that uses sedation in order to correct my teeth! Thanks to the Aspen group in Decatur, Al. for their assistance! Sincerely, Randy Harrod

name: CedCritt In Real Life
text: 0 stars if I could. The staff was so dry. No emotion. Almost like robots. The dentists were not rude, but they wasn’t friendly either. Kinda had the feeling that no one really knew what they were doing. My overall impression is that they were there for one reason.......to get as much money out me as they could. I went to get some work done even though it was only my initial visit. I had $1800 in my pocket because I already knew what I wanted when I got there. Once I saw it was a money mill I pretended like I couldn’t pay for ANYTHING that day. Different are going to have different opinions. I’m not trying to influence else’s opinion of the place. I’m merely expressing my experience. I wouldn’t recommend Aspen Dental to anyone. Not even an enemy.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention,  I am sorry you did not have a good experience. I will certainly pass this information along to management. Thank you — Kelly, ADMI

text: Dr. Ross and the staff in the back were very friendly and nice,  but the office girl up front was not friendly at all. A little smile and thank you when I gave her my papers, that I filled out at home, is not going to hurt anyone.

name: Renee Thomas
text: This was my first visit. I was expecting to go in, get a procedure done and leave. Instead, I got a free initial exam, and everyone explained things to me and listened to my concerns, my fears, and my input on what they were telling me. The doctor and hygentist, office manager, and dental assistants were all very professional. Because of my dental issues, I will have my first procedure done in two days, and I have confidence that they will do a great job and help me ease my fears of the dentist.

name: Charles Key
text: Went in yesterday for my first exam.  Everybody was very friendly and knowledgeable. I have allot of work to be done and the prices seem to be good.

name: H P
text: Told me I had a ‘dangerous gum disease’ and that the dentist would be in shortly to tell me ‘what procedure’ would be necessary.  They were talking about gingivitis LOL.  Flossed and rinsed vigorously for 2 weeks and done for about $7.  This place just tries to scare you in to paying more and squeezing visits and procedures out of you. Find a you a local dentist- you’ll be glad you did.

resp.text: I'm sorry you felt that way, Hannah. We value your feedback, and I will pass your message along to our Patient Satisfaction team. - Emily, ADMI

name: Shakethia Norton
text: I went in for a procedure that I thought was supposed to be a total procedure: Bridge work, deep cleaning, etc. It was explained to me before going that the cost of the procedure was 1000 plus dollars but both insurances would pay the cost of up to 900 and some change. Nothing was explained in detail to me. I got the deep cleaning that i know damn well doesn't cost 1000.00 and it was only one cleaning!  I received a bill in the mail for 454.00.  Now my teeth feel worse after having my teeth pulled and the cleaning...I will be finding another dentist immediately and i should have listened to the reviews.

resp.text: I'm so glad to hear that the team put you at ease and helped you have a positive experience. Enjoy your future visits, Shakethia! - Emily, ADMI

name: leslie russell
text: Very professional! Very sweet! Made a grown nervous woman feel at ease! Thanks for a good experience ❤️

name: Chyna Corum
text: Went in today for my six month cleaning. Since I’d been in last December, they have new doctors and I wasn’t aware, which is fine. However, I’ve had fillings done and the new doctors have no record of the last filling that I had and are wanting to fill and make me repay for a tooth even after it’s already been filled. I feel as if they’re trying to make me think I’m crazy when I know for a fact that I went in to have that specific tooth filled. When I asked them what was it I paid for then, they told me they didn’t know because they weren’t there at that time. So in their minds, there was a doctor messing around in my mouth, telling me he was filling a tooth when he really didn’t? They are also saying I have another cavity that I wasn’t aware I had (they didn’t find it this time, apparently it’s been there sometime but I’m assuming the previous doctors didn’t tell me or it’s not true??). Aspen was fine when I first went to them a little over a year ago but I feel that they have become very unprofessional. I don’t understand how they can just tell patients that they didn’t have a specific work done just because there’s no record of it because they changed doctors. I will not be paying twice for work that I know for a fact that I had done. I will be finding a new dentist that doesn’t have multiple doctors in and out. Dr. A at Aspen informed that I would see doctors come and go from there and I’d much rather be at a facility that has the same doctor(s) so that I don’t have this unprofessionalism.

name: chiquta mosley
text: The staff was very friendly and when I say Dr.Ross was Great!!!! she was Great!!! .Didn't feel any pain at all.

resp.text: We’re happy to know you had a great experience, Chiquta.  Thank you for sharing! – Courtney, ADMI

name: Joyce Wilson
text: Very professional while also personable. Explained in terms a layperson found understandable. State of the art facility; yet comfortable and concerned with my confusion. Lovely staff /Denise! and of course Dr. Green.  Would  recommend to my own family.

name: Misty Davis
text:
It was a great experience. I've suffered for a few years with 2 top plates that never fit & were very uncomfortable, & crooked. (I tried going with a nationally advertised, cheaper same day service). Cheaper is not always better!! I set up an appointment, got in the next day. Everyone was very professional, caring, & understanding. They done everything to make me comfortable & to meet my needs. Needless to say after being there nearly 4 hours, I walked out with a great big smile, new denture, no adhesive, I can honestly say my experience was a blessing! Also the staff was super excited for me. They made sure everything was perfect, to my standards. (They even stayed a few minutes late to accomodate me).
Still Smiling!!!!😁😁😁😁😁

name: SHANAAH CHEREE
text: The staff is so friendly and inviting! They make you feel welcome regardless of what your teeth look like. I would recommend it over most dentists in my area.

text: Very nice people that are very, very busy! Its very clean and being new is updated with all the latest equipment. I want to turn the 4star to a 5star in the next couple of visits.

name: Patricia Watson
text: Dr. Green and the staff at Aspen Dental in Decatur,AL. are a great bunch of people. I have no complaints at all about my experience with them. I would recommend them to everyone with dental needs.

text: They were very informative and made us feel very welcomed.

text: Every single person I encountered in that office was so  amazing.  So pleasant and very knowledgeable about their job.

text: It was great. Every one was awesome. My first visit I knew that I had made a good choice. The problem that I had was treated. I feel wonderful.looking forward to my next visit.

resp.text: Hi Joanne, I'm so glad the team put you at ease and helped you have a 5-star experience. Enjoy your future visits! - Emily, ADMI

name: Beverly Gonzalez
text: My experiences at Aspen Dental have been nothing short of great! In the past, I had suffered so many traumas from going to the dentist that I would have anxiety attacks just thinking about going. And, the cost that came with those visits, to me was not worth it. Well, Aspen Dental of Decatur changed all that for me! From the moment I stepped into their friendly staffed office on the Beltline; I was treated like a star. The receptionist was professional and polite. Ashley, the ex-ray tech, did everything to make me feel comfortable without making me feel "shamed" for the poor condition of my teeth. Dr. Tara Cochran (who will, probably, be my dentist for the rest of my life..I hope), she gave me all the necessary information so that I could make a good choice in my dental plan. And, Tawana, their VERY helpful, professional office manager helped me find a third-party finance party that gave me a VERY reasonable payment plan. NOW, I have a beautiful smile in the works thanks to Dr. Cochran, Chloe, Claire, Ashley, Savana, and Sean! I know that this is a long review, but I just want everyone who reads this, and you need ANY type of dental care; go to Aspen Dental of Decatur. You will not regret it.

resp.text: That's wonderful to hear, Beverly! Thank you for sharing! -- Kelsey, ADMI

name: JRJ
text:
Unfortunately, Decatur, Al. office does not perform implant dentures. I was redirected to the Cullman, Al. office which is  a further drive. Plus the visit was .a waste of a lot of time. Driving to and fro, and waiting to be seen  by the DR. I am disabled and do not drive but short distances  so this also involved another person's time.  Your staff was nice and  friendly.  Although
when i first made the appointment I was told this office did do implant dentures, I informed them I currently have  5 implants now. But wasn't redirected to call the Cullman office.
Thanks

resp.text: I am sorry to hear about this miscommunication, Jason. I will inform the office of this feedback. Thank you! -- Kelsey, ADMI

name: Donna Smith
text: I was told don't worry we will take care of everything with the insurance company so they do all the work pulled 3 teeth that I wish I had never done and got new dentures top and bottom, well they never got right ,so one of the lady dentist told me they would upgrade them at no cost and they would fit better and not hurt as much I already paid 1500.00 out of pocket well my insurance didn't pay all I still owed then 385. Well now that I got the comfy lites that don't fit no better they sending me a bill for 2000.00 for the balance and the upgrade to the better ones. The staff is very nice and professional but their new manager is a different story. It's on my chart and I've tried to call and talk to the office manager and explain this they told me it wouldn't cost me nothing. And ever who answers these reviews isn't nice either! Ok now that I paid the 385.00 apparently they are charging me another 565.00 for the upgrade and have turned it over to collections! I don't understand why they say one thing and turn around and do another. I will not recommend them to anybody again. Something ain't right when all the employees go to somewhere else.

Finally got in the service was exceptional treated me very well and explained everything and felt they were very honest and caring in my feelings and how they could help was made comfortable as possible i felt. over all good experience. Today i call to schedule time to come in tooth pain bad for three days over holiday there dont answer trying since 7:45 am call scheduling dept she finds out there not open til 10 am for some reason and she didn't know why. Little frustrating ill call back at 10am.

name: regina gamble
text: They are more concerned with running my bill up and gouging me & my insurance company than fixing my tooth which is the reason for my visit. First took about 30 x-rays and I have only 27 teeth. Second visit for required gingivitis treatment which was supposed to take 45 minutes too and hour but only took 15 minutes my past teeth cleaning did more and we're free instead of uncovered cost $150. Set up third appointment because insurance paid for follow check up gingivitis treatment tooth still not fixed. Also prices on website with coupons doesn't apply since I have insurance double the price and they count tooth different surfaces vs per tooth for filings which is different from all other dentists I've gone too. Plus state bill over $2000 but doesn't provide and itemized copy for you too review very shady....

text: This place is a joke I made an appointment to have my teeth cleaned I arrive wait over an hour then a lady comes and gets me for X-ray she tore my mouth to pieces not to mention very rude after that they tell me this is a assessment and they will next measure my teeth to come up with a treatment plan are you serious none of this was disclosed when I made an appointment for a CLEANING and after all this refuse to give me my x-rays stay far away from these people

name: Arielle Cain
text: The office manager is horrible. I had a root canal completed at another location. Fast forward and I begin to have issues with the tooth that had the root canal. I call the Decatur office (I now live closer to this location, unfortunately) and specifically ask if they will be able to address an issue that another location serviced. The office manager encourages me to come to their office for the issue. A month goes by and it is the day of my appointment. I call and ask if I may come in early since I finished up with work early. The receptionist puts me on hold to speak with the office manager.(DUM, DUM, DUM...*music fit for a villain begins to play**not really, but it should have*) He begins to say that they can't work on the issue and I would need to visit the Aspen Dental location that completed the root canal. ( If you're reading this Greg, in the future you might want to do your research about your company's policies before wasting another person's time) The office manager goes on to tell me that he called and left a voicemail yesterday to tell me all of this information. And I told him that I didn't have a missed call or voicemail from him. And that I thought it was ironic that the other five calls that we exchanged a month ago were never missing from my phone. Only now that I explain that I am irritated that when I called a month ago he gave me a different answer are his call and voicemail from yesterday "magically" absent from my phone. He proceeds to say, "well I know for a fact that I called and left a voicemail." To which I respond, " I know for a fact that I don't have a missed call or voicemail. He then laughs sarcastically. So I told him, " since he thought it was appropriate to speak to me that way then I decided to respond in the same manor." And the conversation ends with him telling me that they will not ever see me in their office. If I could give zero stars, I would. If he would have just apologized and not smarted off, I would have been understanding. Extremely horrible experience. I hope the office manager deals with a similar incident differently in the future. Too bad this compliant won't see the light of day in a performance review.

text: There is NO better dentist, nor dentist staff, that is better than Dr. Dillard and his staff!! I have been to a lot of dentists in my lifetime and they are at the top of my list !!!

I highly recommend them !

text: Our family has been long term patients of Dr. Dillard and we can't say enough good things about the entire staff!  They're always up to date on new techniques and are very careful to make your visit as pain free as possible.  We wouldn't go anywhere else and we highly recommend Dr. Dillard!

text:
Lisa Tucker is the most amazing person in the world! I could not imagine going to a dentist that did not employ someone like Lisa.

Also, everyone there is amazing too. They make you feel like you're at home which is hard to do at a dentist's office. I have recommended them multiple times and will continue to do so.

text: Great experience! More than patient and gentle with my sensitive teeth, always kind and trying to make sure i’m comfortable.

text:
From start to finish this dental office was top notch!  The front staff had smiles on their faces when you walk in.  Then your hygienist comes out to greet you, mine being Shelley.  She sits down in front of you making you feel like you were her family and I love that because it makes you feel as though they truly do care!  Then of course on to the next part of the dentist, WHICH I HATE” Shelley made very pleasant!
After all that the bad news😩!  I have MS so my teeth have a lot of issues and Dr. Dillard was so caring and very sweet and was going to work on a plan to help my teeth!  Great experience 💙😊😊😊

resp.text: Thank you so much for your courage and honesty

name: Peggy Strauss
text:
Dr. Dillard and his staff are very professional, kind, do excellent work, and will go over and beyond the call of duty to be there when you need them. I had a dental emergency when out of town, called them for advice, they gave me the name and number of a dentist out of town to help me temporarily, then, met me at their clinic as soon as I returned to Birmingham to repair my tooth permanently.
Another time when I had a dental emergency, Dr. Dillard was out of town. What did he do? He actually came back from his trip early to meet me at his clinic after hours on a day they were closed!  He brought his wife to be his dental assistant and he repaired my tooth in order for me not to miss work the next morning!  What else can I say about this awesome doctor and his amazing staff!?! They are the best! I highly recommend them!!!

resp.text: THANK YOU!

name: SJ
text: He is the best dentist I have ever gone to.  My son & his wife also use him and speak very highly of him. If you want a great dentist Dr. Dillard is it. Fred Cross

text: I received OUTSTANDING care from Dr Dillard and Lisa during my recent visit and would highly recommend his services to anyone looking for superior dental care provided with patience, gentle care, and genuine concern for patient comfort and satisfaction. Scheduling is a breeze. The new patient process is seamless. They are well staffed and I always manage to get an appointment when it is convenient for me. Not to mention that their staff is amazing and very friendly and genuinely interested in your well being. I would highly recommend them to friends and family!

resp.text: Thanks Marilyn! We are ecstatic that you are now a patient! We can't wait to see your beautiful smiling face and sassy stylish self, back in our office.

text: I have been going to Dr. Dillard for many years. He has replaced several of my old crowns. He was able to make my crowns there in his office the same day and put my permanent crowns in. I would recommend Dr. Dillard to anyone looking for a dentist in Pelham, Helena , Alabaster and Hoover.

She was in a hurry and botched the whole procedure terribly. After the Novocain wore off my bite was uneven. I called and went back the next day and they tried to grind it back to normal. Still, a week later Im in pain and my bite is worse.
The recommended Advil.
Awesome.
I will not be back. I will find another dentist.

name: Matt Wood
text: What an awesome place! Dr. Krempa and his staff do a great job of explaining exactly what type of treatment is best for your situation, he also breaks it down for an old sports minded person to understand. His front office is always smiling and seem happy to see you. There is a reason I drive 2 hours one way to see them! I appreciate them more than they know. Where else can you go and watch Police Academy while getting your teeth cleaned?

name: Keshon Hunt
text: I was seen at this office last week and it was the most horrible dental visit I've ever experienced. My overall treatment was rushed, I wasn't completely numb and felt everything from the drill though out the process. After treatment I was in a lot of pain but was told that my doctor went to lunch and that I wouldn't have to come back later. I returned around 4:00pm and was told that the doctor is gone for the day and that I could pick something up Monday. After suffering over the weekend I called back in Monday and the same Nurse told me the doctor said use salt water. The whole process was horrible, all patients should be treated equally. I've paid over 2,000 down cash for my visit . If I was aware that I would be treated that way I would of took my money and service elsewhere. Unfortunately I have to return to finish up my treatment but wouldn't recommend this practice to ANYONE!

text: Amazing practice! Very clean place with a friendly professional atmosphere. They go above and beyond to make sure your comfortable and feel at home from dentist to hygienist. Always a pleasant experience!!

name: Shannon Pugh
text: My experience on Tuesday was awesome, I was terrified but when I walked in the ladies at the desk were friendly and professional, I went to have my teeth clean, and the hygienist Dana was phenomenal she made me feel so comfortable, and also she did and amazing job, the doctor was fantastic he pulled my tooth and it didn't hurt, I will recommend all my family and friends to Southern Smile 😁

name: Kacie Whitt
text: The staff are extremely friendly and make sure you are well taken care of and cared for! I had Tamara, and she is the sweetest, y'all. Everyone here is very professional. I highly recommend Southern Smiles!

name: Jennifer Feagin
text: My daughters and I had a great experience. Dr. Krempa and the staff were friendly, patient, and gentle. The office was welcoming and inviting.

name: Monique franklin
text: Kept being misinformed of prices and payment plans.  Will not be going back.

name: Joshua Hunter
text: Excellent service and very informative.

name: N Claytron
text: Ms. Dana took very good care of me and my teeth.

name: Cethia Scott
text: Coming from someone who does not leave reviews like that, yes, all these good reviews are very true. I had Tamara and she was so lovely y’all. I was comfortable. I didn’t feel embarrassed. I really enjoyed getting my teeth cleaned today. If you’re looking for a dentist office anywhere in west mobile with a sweet staff and fair prices, then this is definitely the place to go.

name: Michael Lane
text: I'm actually terrified of dentists but this man and his staff was absolutely amazing. I have severe anxiety but yet this man and his assistant were perfect. I couldn't ask for anyone better to work on my teeth and I will never pick anyone else to be my dentist!!! 100/5 best dentist I could have ever asked for!

name: zach harris
text: I had an emergency and they got me in within hours. Very friendly, fast, professional, and painless. I have had poor experiences with past dentists but Southern Smiles really impressed me!

resp.text: Glad everything went well for you! We love helping our patients.

name: Ashley Smith
text: Read the reviews for lowest to highest. The dentist Krempra from what I’ve seen only interacts with the “other”patients on a friendly caring level and converses with them me and my mom both came to this same conclusion. He has a negative vibe. He also is very rough and rushes and I’ve been to many dentist before. We will not be returning. I don’t recommend this office to people of color because of him.

resp.text:
Ashley,
Everyone here at Southern Smiles is committed to the highest levels of patient care, thoroughness and compassion towards everyone. If someone working in our practice doesn't exhibit this commitment, their tenure here is very short lived.

As for me as a doctor of dental medicine, being accused of this type of behavior personally has been somewhat of a shock. I know my patients on a first name basis and cannot recall you. I checked our database and do not have a "Ashley Smith".

If Ashley Smith is an alias you're using, please contact us directly so that we may do our best to address these concerns.

name: Raquel Rios
text: Got my family in the same day, and we were unfortunately half an hour late and they were still willing to see us! The cost was much less than anticipated, comfortable,  front desk staff was very sweet, and best of all the entire appointment was an hour start the finish! Coming back for follow up work

name: Cresha Montgomery
text: Very great experience! Everyone was just so professional and nice 👍🏽

resp.text: We try and treat everyone like family! Thanks for the review.

name: Amber Moody
text: Was so nervous going and had a problem with my insurance but they took the time to get to the bottom of it and figure it out and Dana put me at ease

name: Sofia Guisasola
text: I am a college student who does not live in Mobile so I was worried the dentist here was not going help me out like they do at home. I walked in at 8:30am and by 8:40am I was seated ready to be treated. They did an amazing job and my tooth (I had a root canal done) feels 10x better. Everyone who works there is beyond nice and very welcoming. They all made me feel comfortable. I highly recommend to anyone who needs dental care.

name: Ethan Mcgath
text: My wait time was minimal and everyone I came in contact with was friendly. My hygienist Chloe was gentle, professional, and efficient but did not rush. She took great care of me and made me feel right at home. I had to come back to have some work done and that appointment was just as smooth. I am pleased with the outcome. I highly recommend Dr. Krempa and his staff to anyone in search of a new dental office!

name: Ashley Lassiter
text: Every time I've come here, everyone is always so friendly and caring. The whole team is phenomenal. I've never had to wait more than a few minutes. Dr. Krempa is fantastic and is always straightforward and honest with what I need to help keep my teeth and mouth healthy. I appreciate that so much. I also appreciate that everyone is understanding of someone on a budget and help me work with what I have to get the care I need. Thank you guys so much!

name: Ronnie Everett
text: Great service and staff. Highly recommend..

name: Classy Mcmillan
text: Very friendly and professional staff, I loved my experience and will definitely be going back!

name: Melody Bagwell
text:
Very professional and helpful! I had my teeth cleaned and I have good cleanings in the past but this experience was top notch!
The Dr. Was wonderful and came up with a great plan for upcoming dental work.
I have high anxiety with dental care and usually do not have the best experiences. This was wonderful!!! I have Zero anxiety about my next visit. Can't wait to get started.

name: Cheyenne Bobo
text:
I hadn't been to the dentist since I was a very young child and I couldn't have had a better experience. I felt genuinely welcomed and educated. I know what I need to do now to maintain my health and I was given very clear instructions with ample opportunity to ask questions. Dr. Liz is amazing, but frankly every person I had contact with was incredibly kind and on their game. I was terrified of being judged or being in pain but the cleaning tickled, the tooth that I needed to have taken out was popped out in like 15 seconds with plenty of anesthesia and no pain at all, and I was told that they were proud of me for coming in now which meant the world to me. Dr. Krempa is exactly what you want in a dentist--fast, efficient, very honest, and he seems to genuinely want to do what's best for you.

I can't recommend this dentist enough. Also incredibly reasonable prices. If you haven't been in a while, go here. It's an incredibly welcoming space.

name: Gabby Peitsinovski
text: I recently switched dentist offices and I’m really glad I did! I had to come in for my cleaning and then come again shortly after to get some cavities filled and I had a great experience both times, I also barely had to wait both times! My hygienist’s name is Chloe and she’s awesome!!! She did a wonderful job on my cleaning and also made me feel VERY comfortable because I am not a fan of going to the dentist! I highly recommend Dr. Krempa and his staff to anyone in search of a new dental office!

name: Lisa Myrick
text: Great dentist and great staff. Everyone in the office is very professional, pleasant, kind and considerate. They go above and beyond to provide great service and trear their parents like family. I feel very fortunate to have found Dr. Krempa and wouldn’t go anywhere else.

name: Thor Buckingham
text: My wife and I are very pleased with Dr Krempa and his staff! They are all beginning to feel like family to us as my wife is having extensive work done! Best dental office we’ve ever had the pleasure of being part of!

name: Jonathan Brown
text: I get all of my regular checkups and cleanings here. I recently had 8 crowns done across the front and I’m very pleased with how they turned out. Staff is friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Reslyn Luba Rivera
text: I am very pleased with my routine visit today. Always prompt, nice to be greeted as you walk in the office & get everything done right on time. Thanks to Angela for making me comfortable & doing a great job. The entire staff are very nice, courteous, friendly, polite  & helpful answering my questions & concerns. Great job Dr K & Dr M! Special thanks to Jade & Ashley, awesome staff!

name: Kristen Rosson
text: Taylor was so nice and helpful. She was very understanding and caring for my daughter who needed an unexpected appt. The entire staff was friendly and helpful. I highly reccomend!

name: Cindy Peeler
text:
My family and I love Southern Smiles!
Our Doctors and staff are the best in their fields! The office is a very warm and inviting place. We are always greeted with a smile!
The staff is always very accommodating to changing schedules of busy families, and we have definitely put them to the test!! Always professional, and always cheerful! They take great care of our family's dental health!!

name: Tyesha Smith
text: Very great staff. Very understanding and they made sure I walked out of there very happy with my decision. Could not have picked a better place !!!

name: Zsadez Buchanon
text: Excellent service. For a first time visit I called, and got scheduled for an appointment the very next day. I was seen, quoted, and had work done in under an hour. Highly recommended.

name: William Tew
text: Dr. Krempa and his entire staff are simply the greatest!  Once again I am very satisfied with Alex's work. As for his assistant's; Judy, Anna, and Chloe, they have been very sweet and courteous and have all displayed great care and professionalism. This has made each visit a very pleasant experience. A special thank you to my hygienist, Jade, for a detailed explanation of how the procedure would be performed and the care and comfort she provided. This is a great group of people and I would highly recommend anyone to give them a try.

name: Sinh Nguyen
text: I've been going to this place for a little over 10 years now.  Love the staff.   Amazingly friendly and knowledgeable people.  Would highly recommend.  And thank you Liz for always taking your time and doing a wonderful job with my heavy cigarette stained teeth every time.

name: Sinh Nguyen
text: I've been going to this place for a little over 10 years now.  Love the staff.   Amazingly friendly and knowledgeable people.  Would highly recommend.  And thank you Liz for always taking your time and doing a wonderful job with my heavy cigarette stained teeth every time.

name: Anthony Thompson
text: Outstanding customer service. Professional, competent, and straight forward. One of the best expirences of my life.

name: Deanna Guinn
text: I had a great experience during my first visit. Everyone in the office was extremely nice and helpful. Jade was my hygienist, and she was excellent. She was very friendly and made me feel comfortable during my visit. Dr. Krempa was wonderful. He was very knowledgeable, and took his time to make sure I understood everything. I highly recommend Southern Smiles!

name: Jenn C
text: Excellent.  I absolutely love them!  They are the best!

name: Jessica Tillman
text: I went here for an emergency appointment for the first time and they took care of me immediately. They had a super nice staff that were all dedicated to helping their patients. They did a thorough exam to find the root of the problem and were able to fix it. I highly recommend them.

name: Sr. Mary Joyce Bringer
text: I hit all the green lights and got their early and was taken in early.  It was a cleaning and the atmosphere was very pleasant.  The dental assistant was very thorough and friendly as well as the dentist.  I got back to warm sooner than then expected.

name: A Little
text: Super friendly staff!

resp.text: We try and make everyone feel comfortable!

name: Jessica Allrex
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Krempa’s since he began working in the Mobile area. Dr. Krempa and his team have taken great care of me over the years and I would recommend his and Dr. Martin’s practice to anyone looking for a warm, welcoming and experienced group at Southern Smiles!

name: TINA HA
text: Dr. Krempa and the team are awesome. The four people I've interacted with  have all been super sweet and helpful. Dr. Krempa, Chloe, Taylor and Anna have exceeded my expectations.

name: Karen Gunter
text: I am a senior citizen and I have been to a number of dentists in my life . A few months ago I decided to go to Dr. Krempa, I am so glad I did! Dr. Krempa and his staff are very professional and take great care to make you feel at ease and have as much of a pain free experience as possible, I am impressed! I have had a lot of work done in the last few months and either Dr.Krempa or one of his staff always calls to check on me. I live in Baldwin County , but it’s worth the drive. I highly recommend !

name: Kasie T (KTB)
text: This group is wonderful! I am not a fan of dentists, and tend to get anxious when I go, but when I called these guys due to what I thought was an abscessed tooth they worked me in right away. They went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable and relaxed the entire time. Also, when they figured out the issue they didn't recommend anything drastic which only made me respect them that much more. Highly recommend!

name: Eric Oliver
text: Great staff. My hygienist, Angelia, is great. She always does a great job, and takes her time. Dr. Krempa is also very friendly. I changed jobs a few months ago, so there are a lot of Dentist that would be closer, and more convenient. I will continue to use Southern Smiles and would not consider changing.

name: Marie Debose
text: Staff is very friendly and informative. They do not try to talk you into paying for unnecessary procedures and they display a considerate attitude. I will definitely continue to use them and recommend them to anyone looking for a dentist

name: Ashley Ferguson
text: Dr. Krempa and his staff have helped me overcome my anxiety of dental appointments. They are extremely friendly and concerned for your personal well being. Their follow up after each appointment has been much appreciated. I now look forward to my check-up appointments and highly recommend checking them out!

name: Rikia Baker
text: I've only been once and that one time made a great impression. I like the staff. They are very friendly and nice. Everyone, including Dr. Krempa, is just easy to talk to and they make you feel comfortable. Also, the place is clean and is a nice, welcoming environment. I definitely will be back.

name: DAWN CARRELL
text: Staff are all amazing. They work hard to fit the appointments to my schedule. The in-and-out time is great-no waiting 20 minutes in the lobby. I really appreciate this office and everything they do to make dentistry a pleasant experience.

name: Ashley Robertson
text: Jade and Dr. Krempa provided me with excellent, stress-free and caring dental care. Jade, my hygienist, clearly holds herself to a very high standard. I left there feeling so confident about how well she took care of my teeth.  I have definitely found my favorite place for all things smiles.  Thank you to all of the staff of Southern Smiles for making my first experience there so wonderful.

name: Jessica Smith Fitness
text: The office staff is welcoming and friendly. Makes me feel comfortable. Also, I loved how flexible they were with squeezing me into their schedule when I needed work done. Went over cost before procedures and educated me on how to maintain a healthier smile. I have definitely found my dentist!

name: Lisa Brannon
text: The words “professional” and “amazing” comes to mind when i think about Dr. Krempa, Dr. Martin, and staff.

name: Lydia Davis
text: Dr. Krempa's office is great! (Jade....you rock!!) There is never much of a wait, the staff is so friendly and they do great work! My son loves going and that says a lot! Thank you for being the best dental group ever!

name: Stacy Pearce
text: I have been seeing Dr. Krempa for all of my dental work, and I must say I have been thoroughly impressed with his work. He is as professional as they come and manages to balance that with a very high sense of comfort. The entire staff is excellent and knowledgeable and they do everything they can to make sure you are taken care of to the fullest. I strongly recommend you make the switch to him, you will not regret it!

name: Chloe McGath
text: I cannot say enough good things about Southern Smiles! I spent maybe 10 minutes in the waiting room, the treatment I needed was thoroughly explained to me, Dr.Krempa gave me a painless shot, and everyone was so friendly. The staff made me feel like a priority, not just another patient! I have never felt so at home in a doctors office! I will definitely be back!

name: B H
text: Alex is a great dentist! The staff there is always helpful, and make you feel right at home. I recommended Alex to my wife , and would encourage anyone looking for a dentist to give Southern Smiles an opportunity.

name: Kellie Green
text: The staff is always super nice and welcoming. If I have any questions at all they answer them to the best of their ability. I love how they remember who you are and ask about day to day life. I will continue to go see them :)

name: Samantha Landrum
text: Every time I have been to the office, I have been treated wonderfully! Dr. Krempa always makes sure I have an understanding of what is going on, and his assistants always sit and talk with me about my day for a few minutes. The front desk always works with me on my insurance and my payments. if you want a dentist with a great personality and a comfortable workplace, I highly suggest southern smiles.

name: Melvin Evans
text: Excellent service always!    Very skilled friendly and professional staff.   They take the time to listen and answer your questions.  Service is always prompt.

name: Mike Counselman
text: Great staff, super dentist, would highly recommend Dr K and his staff.

name: Henry Roberts
text: Pulled my lower wisdom teeth out quick and easy. Took a few hours for them to get to me but the actual procedure went better than I could have hoped and that's all that really matters for me. Nurses were very friendly.

name: Leigh White
text: Best experience with a dental practice ever. Dr. Krempa is friendly and always seems to have a positive attitude. He always listens, answers questions, and never seems rushed. Liz, the dental hygienist is wonderful as well. She has cleaned my teeth several times. She is very friendly and informative. I highly recommend this practice to anyone!

name: Catherine McQuillan
text:
Received an A+  Outstanding dental work up and support from Dr. Krempa and staff!  This dentist has a great attitude,  answers all my questions, very up to date, thorough & provides needed suggestions for best dental care!
Staff (dental hygienists) are the best I've ever encountered as well, from the tooth cleaning to the supportive care!  I have sensitive teeth, and I can honestly say that these folks make every effort to keep me free of pain and they do it!  You guys rock!!!!

name: Tommy Graham
text: I've been under the care of Southern Smiles for about a year now and have been nothing but impressed with Drs Krempa and Martin and their staff. I have been seeing a hygenist there, Chloe, who has been not only a warm person to speak with but a caring professional! I look forward to many more years witht his group!

name: Amani Alloul
text: My experience with Dr. Krempa's office has been less than pleasant. After he worked on a tooth that did not cause any discomfort, I am now in the most excruciating pain! I absolutely DO NOT recommend this dental office. I will not be returning.

name: Dr. Lofton Troy
text: I would recommend Dr. Krempa to all of my family, friends and patients. He is thorough and takes the time to explain your situation and what is needed to get you back to a healthy smile. I do believe that the star of the show for my cleaning visit was Jade. She was patient, answered all of my questions, and showed compassion for her job. Every staff member that I came in contact to had a smile on their face and treated you like a family member. Overall was a great experience and will definitely be going back there on a regular basis to maintain my oral hygiene.  The only bad thing about this review is that I wish I could have left 10 stars... 5 Stars really is not enough!

name: William Troxler
text: I love Liz (it's a "like-love" of course!)! Dr. Martin has been my dentist for many years now and couldn't have selected a better partnership than with Alex Krempa, even though Alex is an Alabama fan! Most of the staff greets me with a "War Eagle" when I arrive because a good many of them are part of the same fan base I'm a part of! The staff is super professional and I hardly ever have to wait more than a few minutes before I'm seen. I'm always greeted by name which offers a personal touch that is important to me. They offer professional advice for whatever work I might have to have done, and try their best to keep the costs within my budget. I highly recommend these professionals to anyone looking for a dentist that will meet your every needs no matter what they are! These people are the greatest! And Alex..."War Eagle"!

name: Brooke Riddle
text: I had such a great experience at Southern Smiles! I have anxiety when going to the dentist and my hygienist, Liz, was amazing and she worked with me and really showed me the proper way to brush and floss! Dr. Krempa was also very nice and professional! I would highly recommend!

name: Georgia Bunkley
text:
Dr. Krempa is wonderful.   He is very approachable, knowledgeable, and friendly.  His staff is the same.  There is no need to fear the dentist or the hygienists if you go to him.  They do an excellent job going above and beyond what,s necessary .

Georgia B.

name: Taylor Brannon
text: I just want to say how lovely my visits have been at the office. My grand daughter referred me to the office after I moved back to Mobile from Jacksonville, Florida. I really needed to get re-established as a patient and this office seemed to be the perfect fit for me. I love getting my teeth cleaned but like most patients I have extreme anxiety because of past experiences. I was welcomed in with open arms. There is coffee and water in the waiting area as well as magazines and tv for entertainment. Dr. Krempa and Dr. Martin both are wonderful and seemed very understanding of both my anxiety and financial situation. I felt like both dentists and the hygienist (Ashley) cared about me and my treatment needs instead of how much he could get out of my pocket book. I ended up needing a filling and their schedule seemed super flexible. I didn’t have to wait longer than a day or two to get in for treatment. Overall my cleaning and filling appointments went well and I will continue to return for my visits. Thank you Dr. Krempa, Dr. Martin, and staff!

name: joshua coleman
text: Dr. Krempa is an great dentist and does a wonderful job. His staff is wonderful, kind, inviting, and very informative. I for one hate going to the dentist but my experience here is that it is the best office I had ever been too. My family and I will continue to use them for as long as we are in Mobile.

name: Annonomous
text: Love these folks! Hands down the very best in Mobile!  Hardly ever a wait! Extremely vibrant and relaxing atmosphere.  Super clean. Staff is AMAZING! LOVE those girls! Dr. Krempa is super gentle, kind, professional and informative. Literally just left from having my first ever wisdom tooth pulled, was super nervous. Dr. Krempa promised me no pain. And within literally 5 seconds the tooth was pulled and we were done. No bleeding and no pain! Just wow!

name: Luci Whitworth
text: Very pleasant experience as always, my hygienist Liz is professional, personable and very friendly. I can't imagine having my teeth cleaned by anyone but Liz. Dr. Krempa and Dr. Martin are wonderful dentists. Look no further this is the best dental office in Mobile.

name: William Rogers
text: Got a filing in august and it fell out by january so I went and got it fixed now im out of pocket because its been less than 12 months on that tooth but to be honest being I have never had a feeling fall out so I didnt want to go back and get more drilling on that tooth to fix a bad filling. They wanted to do a crown on the other side ummm not going to happen.

name: Sarah Klinshaw
text: I came to this dentist office after reading other google reviews. I was a little nervous as i had been going to my previous dentist for 16 years. My experience was amazing! Everyone there treated me like i had been going there for years and jade was the best hygenist ever!

name: Anthony Keating
text: I cannot say enough about the quality of service that you will receive from Dr. Krempa and his staff at Southern Smiles. I have had dental work in several other offices across the state and every single one of them falls short in comparison to the professionalism and quality of the dental care that you will receive at Southern Smiles. Shots are basically painless, I have never sat in the waiting room more than ten minutes, the staff is extremely accommodating as well as hospitable and the work they have done is helping me to become proud of my smile one visit at a time. I doubt there is another dentist around that I will willingly go to.

name: Phyllis Jeffery
text: Thorough cleaning and diagnostics by top-notch hygienist, Liz, and the much-loved dentist, Dr. Martin. Friendly staff and clean, pleasant environment. A busy office that inspires confidence!

name: Rebecca Howard
text: I moved to Mobile about 4 years ago from Birmingham where I had been using the same dentist my entire life. I made an appointment with Dr. Krempa and have been so pleased with all parts of his practice. His staff treats you with complete kindness and patience and Dr. Krempa always takes as much time as you need to talk about any needs. I use Liz as my hygienist and she is the BEST.

name: Pete Allen
text: Very friendly service. Liz is wonderful.  She makes you feel comfortable.  Waiting time is short. Definitely recommend

name: JESSICA TICE
text: Just had my first visit here. My appointment was met on time. All staff was polite..if not welcoming and entertaining. Made sure I had 0 pain and stayed comfortable. Got a goody bag or 2 to come home with. Thanks yall!

name: James Mistrot
text: The overall atmosphere of the office is warm, friendly and welcoming. If you have anxiety when it comes to seeing the dentist, no worries. Dr. Krempa and his staff do an amazing job at helping you feel at ease.

name: Timothy Davis
text: The whole staff at Southern Smiles PC was very kind and helpful in getting me the care I needed. Professional and pain free thanks, you guys are the best.

name: Kelsey Pope
text: Dr. Krempa's office and staff have been extraordinarily nice and knowledgeable. Liz does my cleanings and she is fantastic! They always do a wonderful job and truly care for their patients.

name: Jamie Pierkowski Ishmael
text: Love Dr. Krempa and his staff. Everyone is so nice from the minute you walk in the door to when you are through and check out. Liz does a great job cleaning my teeth and all the other dental assistants are wonderful too.  Dr. Krempa recently capped some of my lower teeth and replaced an old lower bridge. I love the results. They are wonderful for dental emergencies also.  Dr. Martin is also great. I moved to Mobile about three years ago and was worried about changing dentists. I had the same dentist for over 30 years. I feel just  as at home here as I did at my old dentist. My husband is also a patient and loves them as much as I do.

name: Areona Long
text: Dr. Alex and Angela are the best!  Always on schedule, best dental hygienist in town.  Very nice, clean, state of the art office facilities and procedures.

name: Max Cartwright
text: Great staff. Facility and service. Great Dentist. Very caring and if you need them day or night Dr. Krempa will answer the call.

name: eileen lafon
text:
Had a wonderful experience having my teeth cleaned today, by the best hygentist, Angela. She was so gentle and very knowledgeable.

Thanks again, Eileen

name: Ronald Greene
text: I am very happy to have a team of professionals that I trust to take care of all of my dental needs.  Everyone in the office is very nice and I always feel comfortable

name: derekdaniels1
text: Great friendly environment and staff. Nothing but professionalism from Dr. Krempa and his whole staff. I took the kids there today for their first appointment while I had mine, and they all came away impressed and they were very comfortable with everybody. We live in Mississippi, and it’s an hour away from mobile, but once I went there over a year ago I swapped dentist and Dr. Krempa is the best I’ve ever used and he’ll be our family dentist for years to come.

name: Cassie Crowley
text: Great staff! Very knowledgeable and explained everything thoroughly. Dr. Krempa is wonderful. Best dental experience ever!

name: Christen Strang
text: I'd never consider going anywhere else.. Liz is absolutely wonderful, and the whole staff is super friendly and very professional. Highly recommend!

name: Gina Patrick
text: The staff is extremely professional and knowledgeable. Dr. Krempa is very efficient and explains the procedures so you understand them. Best dentist and hygienist in the Bay Area.

name: Nelly Arrocha
text: This was my second time at Southern Smiles and I loved it! The staff is welcoming and my wait was not long! I will continue to come here!

name: Stoney Boatman
text: What a great experience for a bad situation. Wonderful staff and Dr. Alex was excellent in explaining everthing. And I got to watch The Masters during my short wait. Thank you guys!!

name: derekdaniels1
text: Great friendly environment and staff. Nothing but professionalism from Dr. Krempa and his whole staff. I took the kids there today for their first appointment while I had mine, and they all came away impressed and they were very comfortable with everybody. We live in Mississippi, and it’s an hour away from mobile, but once I went there over a year ago I swapped dentist and Dr. Krempa is the best I’ve ever used and he’ll be our family dentist for years to come.

name: Ruth Colvin
text:
My experience with Southern Smiles has been very good.  I have had a
bridge and the hygienist was prompt and through when it came time for
the  cleaning.  The facility is well staffed and comfortable.
Ruth Colvin

name: Shanekia Hunt
text: Jade walked me through a brief itinerary for my first visit at Krempa's dentistry. She even took the time to discuss future goals after a well over due thorough cleaning, by far the best I've ever had. Dr. Krempa and Miss Jade provided exceptional care, professional advice and budget friendly services. It was an excellent start to my day!

name: Michael Tew
text: Super friendly staff, never have to wait beyond appointment time. I have been coming to this dentist office for 24 years and would highly recommend to anyone.

name: Taylor Livingston
text: I've been going to Dr. Krempa for several years and I would highly recommend him with no hesitation. I've always recieved excellent care and trust him will all my dental needs. His staff is always welcoming and professional as well as making me feel like a member of the family. I'll never go anywhere else.

name: Ronald Greene
text: I am very happy to have a team of professionals that I trust to take care of all of my dental needs.  Everyone in the office is very nice and I always feel comfortable

name: Cassie Crowley
text: Great staff! Very knowledgeable and explained everything thoroughly. Dr. Krempa is wonderful. Best dental experience ever!

name: Jamie Pierkowski Ishmael
text: Love Dr. Krempa and his staff. Everyone is so nice from the minute you walk in the door to when you are through and check out. Liz does a great job cleaning my teeth and all the other dental assistants are wonderful too.  Dr. Krempa recently capped some of my lower teeth and replaced an old lower bridge. I love the results. They are wonderful for dental emergencies also.  Dr. Martin is also great. I moved to Mobile about three years ago and was worried about changing dentists. I had the same dentist for over 30 years. I feel just  as at home here as I did at my old dentist. My husband is also a patient and loves them as much as I do.

name: Rose Mary McMahen
text: Always a pleasure to see Liz, staff and Dr. Krempa.  I know when I go there I will receive excellent care and friendly service.  Highly recommend them.

name: Nicholas Reynolds
text: Love Southern Smiles.  Ask for Liz if you need a cleaning, she is the best hygienist in town.  Dr. Krempa is extremely knowledgable and honest.  I completely trust in what he feels is needed and have never been disappointed.

name: Ray Perryman

name: J S
text: BE AWARE!!!!! If you are thinking this dentist is good because he has 100+ positive reviews then you are WRONG! What him and his staff do: As soon as you go in for a cleaning they ask you to fill out a online survey about Dr. Krempa and yes hygienists do a good job cleaning your teeth and are super sweet, which is why everyone leaves good reviews BUT the minute you go back for actual dental work you'll realize he overbooks his patients and then RUSHES THROUGH dental procedures trying to get to everyone.  He did 3 filings on my 3 teeth and was done in 30 mins.  Maybe you are thinking "that's great" but you are WRONG! He left me with teeth that felt like shark teeth because he did not smoothen them out after the feelings.  I went and saw another dentist who said Dr. Krempa did a bad job leaving me with such unfinished work that I pretty much wasn't able to floss my teeth. I could go on by telling you more,  but I believe that this is enough info. WATCH out for him being BUSY AND HAVING GOOD REVIEWS, because a good dentist doesn't overbook and takes his time fixing patients teeth to ensure good quality work!! I would NEVER GO BACK TO SEE HIM OR RECOMMEND HIM TO ANYONE!

My wife went into have a root canal done and  it was a botched job. My wife had pain days after the procedure, he did not even finish the Job the first TIME! She developed an infection from the first job.

When My wife went back for a follow up, he treated her pregnancy as if it was an inconvenience when she refused a second x-ray! The nurse even insinuated that she might miscarry anyway so a x-ray wouldn't be too bad! After all of this they tried to reschedule in a MONTH! Poor workmanship and even worse bedside manner.

So we will not be back and I certainly DO NOT recommend this practice.

I was supposed to go in for just the first exam but she happened to have time to clean my teeth as well! She did a great job, my mouth hasn’t felt this clean in years!! The doctor also came and talked to me, even though I didn’t see him this particular time, which made me feel very comfortable, and talked about what my perfect smile would be and how we could achieve that! name: Brett Morrison
text: My wife and I were looking to take our little guy Charlie to the dentist for the first time at a little over 2.5 years old, and were a little nervous as to how his first visit would go.  I have not had a dentist in Tuscaloosa/Northport since I moved down here over 10 years ago, so I asked for recommendations on Facebook.  Dr.'s Taylor, Hydrick and Gentry at the Smile Design Center kept popping up as recommendations so we decided to call and get an appointment.  The office environment is excellent, and the staff was outstanding and super friendly.  Our hygienist was Kelsey (I hope I spelled her name correctly), and she was amazing with Charlie, and he seemed to really enjoy the experience.  I had not been to the dentist in a while so I had my appointment right after his, and can confirm, that Kelsey and Dr. Taylor are wonderfully gifted at what they do! I had a deep cleaning because it had been a while and it truthfully was not a bad experience at all.  I would highly recommend the Smile Design Center to anyone looking for a great dentist and dentist experience in the Tuscaloosa/Northport area!

resp.text: Hello jgijoe.  I am very sorry that you feel this way. I have repeatedly tried to find out who you are to personally contact you, but we do not have your name or email address in our system. I have personally emailed this gmail address but have had no response from you. We pride ourselves on treating everyone fairly, and we surely do not treat anyone differently based on color. Please call our office 205-750-8008 to further discuss this matter. I will do everything in my power to make sure this is resolved and you are treated fairly and with kindness. - Dr. Gentry
