name: Rubyy Guevaraa
text: Everyone is super nice!!

name: Tracey Walker
text: This dental office didn’t Inform me there was a $97 initial consultation fee before they took me through all the paperwork and the informational tour of the office. I felt like I was at a hard sell timeshare experience. The dentist was very professional but the practice of not informing a new patient of charges that are unexpected is unprofessional. I have never paid any money with my dental insurance provider  and nor could they tell me how much insurance would pay if I visited for another appointment so I would recommend you check first because they aren’t forthcoming with costs nor insurance but they will offer all the fluff of cookies baked daily, and blankets on your lap, MS Alabama beauty queen provider ect. Which personally I would prefer to keep my $97 than have all the fluff.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We did forget to tell you of the first visit fee, and we take full responsibility for that. It was an error on our part, and definitely not how we like to run our practice. We regret any inconvenience and frustration this caused. We have subsequently filed this with your insurance, and anticipate this will be reimbursed. Thank you, and please let us know if you have further questions or concerns.

name: Andrew Maxwell
text: When you have had a traumatic dental experience before you tend to shy away from going. This dentist office if filled with truly compassionate people.  I’ve had  multiple visits and I have come to love the dentist.  I’ve had little to no pain during my appointments and always leave with a smile. Truly confident and experienced dental staff that is top notch. As for Dr. Teichmiller, she is a gentle angel who I will recommend to everyone I see. I’m blessed to have found them.

text: Best dentist and staff in this area! Very nice godly ppl that are willing to go above and beyond! Def my new dentist!

name: Dustin Bates
text: So I had a terrible mouth.  With an abscessed broken molar.  I hadn't been to the dentist in 10 year or more.  My last experience was a terrible one.  I mean I know I haven't taken care of them.  Not once did the office make me feel bad or lecture me.  They were kind and gentle and made the process as comfortable as removing a tooth could possibly be.  I was terrified of having work done.  I was only there "because I had to be." I Even told them that.   Well not only is the team amazing here.  But Dr Barnes who removed my tooth made it an easy and smooth process.  At no point in the procedure did I hurt nearly as bad as I had the morning prior.  It literally blew my mind how little pain and discomfort, I felt during the process.  Major kudos to this team.  I'm not scared to go back.  Heck I'm kinda looking forward to it.  Can't wait to have a good smile and feel confident to show off my teeth again.  Oh and it was very very affordable.  Now looking back it seems silly how big a nightmare I thought it was going to be compared to how it really was.  Don't put it off!!!  Do it today with this team.  You won't regret it.  Excellent job!

name: Patresa Hubbard
text: This is the dentist god, I can’t say this about any other dentist. The courtesy and professionalism is over the top. I’m not a fan of the dentist, but all my anxiety went away after meeting Dr. Stephanie, she is simply amazing .The entire staff made it a easy transition to do business with them. Efficient, knowledgeable, and everything is explained to your understanding. Thank you all for making me feel comfortable.

name: Jamie Phillips
text: LOVE Dr Stephanie Teichmiller and Mallory! From the very first phone call to schedule an appointment to the consultation, I have never felt more relaxed and truly cared for! So happy to begin this journey to a healthy smile!

text: We have had many, many dentists due to my husband’s Army career, and Dr. Teichmiller is hands down the most advanced, professional and efficient dentist office I have ever been in. She and all her staff are friendly, warm and inviting. She takes her time with each of her patients. I can’t recommend Decatur Smiles enough!

name: Rebecca Garrett
text: Dr. Stephanie and her staff are the freaking bomb!!! I drove from Atlanta and it was worth every mile!! Visiting this office is an “experience” from the time you walk in the door until the time you leave!! I have never been treated so nicely!! I was offered so many goodies from the freebies to the snacks (not to mention the personalized note with my name on it). I was also given a tour of the office and received full details on the technology and different procedures offered in the office. Dr. Stephanie met with me prior to getting down to business and asked all the important questions. It’s very obvious she has a passion for what she does. She took it a step further and blocked out some time for me considering I drove in from Atlanta. She wanted to ensure we made the most of our time together and our visit today. Let’s just say I was blown away!! Best dentist office visit ever, hands down!!!! I wish I could click more than just 5 stars!! ❤️ S/N for my next consult she even suggested a FaceTime visit to confirm everything, so I wouldn’t have to drive back and forth!!! #PatientForLife😁😁

name: D Tice
text: I just wanted to say how understanding and caring this office is... I no longer dread going to the dentist office!  They make sure their appointments are on time...no more waiting an hour to see the dentist.   Dr. T uses up-to-date procedures and can take care of all of your dental needs and she does all this with a gentle and concerned attitude I actually fell asleep while she was refilling an old filling!  If you're looking for an excellent dentist office.... you found it with Dr T and staff.

text: Great experience! Everyone is extremely professional and has a caring spirit!

name: Freddie Jones
text:
Initial call last week I was told, over the phone, that initial exam was $37 and I DID NOT have to pay up front and my insurance would be billed. I was very specific when I asked the question. At check out, true enough, I paid $37 but in order to schedule my next 2 appointments I had to pay $130. What part of having to pay $130 to schedule my next 2 appointments is not paying up front when that's the exact question I asked when I called initially.

So why a 3 and not 1? Very detailed consultation/expectations and they give you snacks and a water ! 😂

resp.text: Hi Freddie and thanks for the feedback. We are pleased to hear you are happy with the care you received in our office and we enjoyed serving you! As we shared with you on the phone, the first New Patient appointment is not “prepaid.” As for the second appointment, all new patients prepay. We apologize for any miscommunication regarding this. It is important to Dr. Teichmiller and the rest of the team that we are communicating effectively with our patients and we will take this opportunity to review our communication with patients regarding this. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you at your next visit!

text: Scheduling coordinator is not friendly nor understanding.  Said I would be charged $125.00 for comprehensive first exam because I missed my first appointment.  I was going to be a new patient and they advertised initial exam as "Free" to new patients.  If you go to their website they are chargeing $49 for new patient consult.  Pam sent me several emails to try get me to reschedule an appointment just to drop that $125 bomb on me.  Looks like I'm going to pay $125 for no exam, and  no consult.  REAL FRIENDLY

resp.text: Hi Daron. We are sorry you feel frustrated with your experience. In order to give our patients the best care possible we reserve time with the dentist for them and we then ask them to do their part by honoring their appointment. When the appointment is confirmed that day and they don’t show up (as happened in this case), we ask them to prepay the $125 to show their commitment to honor their next appointment. We hope that helps clarify things for you and we encourage you to reach out to us if you have additional questions. Thank you.

name: Derrick White
text: Dr. Stephanie and her team are the best!!!  They are your next best friend in dentistry.   It's 's not everyday that you find a team of caring professionals that  really care about what is best for you .

resp.text: Derrick, caring for you and your family is easy!  Your desire to have 'the best' encourages us to be 'our best' for you!  Loving your new smile!!

Upon evaluation, she accessed my needs and customized a plan for the work I needed.  I will admit I was concerned regarding the discomfort I might be dealing with due to the extensive nature of my work.  To my relief and surprise, I was never in pain during the whole process.  My procedures were always treated with care and she was keenly aware of my comfort.
Today, I have beautiful teeth that I am not only proud of but I'm always happy to smile and share Dr. Stephanie Teichmillers talent for creating my bright and much more youthful smile.  I have been told I even look younger.  Who doesn't love that?
Thank you Dr. Stephanie Teichmiller for all you have done to give me a reason to SMILE!

name: Jerry Jackson
text:
Went today for cleaning/checkup.   I was in a wheelchair due to on going issues with my leg. Lana escorted me to the room where my treatment would  occur. She was very careful to make sure everyone stayed out of my path. When we got to the treatment room, Lana asked if it was difficult to transfer to the dental chair. I replied “no ma’am” and hopped right into the chair. As my teeth were being cleansed, I fell asleep!!! While Lana is poking all around in my mouth, also using water with suction. I told Lana that I was a high maintenance patient, she treated me like I was the only one she had to are for all day.  After all, I fell asleep while she was poking and running water in my mouth.
I have been cared for as well by others who work there, I would say that their premium treatment is a standard Dr. Thompson requires.
For today——Lana, you are my HERO.
Jerry Jackson

name: Kenneth Cadenhead
text:
I appreciate both the professionalism and the very friendly atmosphere exhibited by all the staff.  The personal interest shown to patients is outstanding.  Thank you for such exceptional service.

I have always been pleased with the service I have received.  I felt the same way today.  I must say, however, when I realized that I paid $527 for cleaning and completing two fillings, I was  concerned. I am a senior citizen on a fixed income, and it troubles me to see the continual increase in dental charges.  Have you ever considered a senior discount?

resp.text: Mr. Cadenhead,  I am glad that you had a great experience.  We aim to provide exceptional customer service. Thank you so much for your feedback.  We heard you and are researching some options right now.

name: Dione Smith
text: I understand with everything that is going on we have to be safely. My daughter appointment and we got their at 12:45pm for our appointment that was at 1 pm . I was told to call when we got there but no one every answered the phone. I had to get the attention to the young lady that was coming from another vehicle to let her know we have an appointment. She also, had an appointment on the dentist side and the orthodontist . Now the orthodontist got her back  and then bought her back out for the dentist side. My daughter had to get a chip tooth that they had to filled. It took them from 130 to almost 245 for the dentist side to finish. I feel that they over booked their appointments . We didn’t get finish until 330pm. I thing they need to reorganized the why they make appointments doing the COVID 19 so parents aren’t sitting in a car for 2 or 3 hrs . Better planning. I was very disappointment today!

text: They take forever to come to the phone and when they do they leave you on hold for an very long time. I literally been trying to get in touch with someone for over an month to get my son braces. Very disappointed.

resp.text: We are truly saddened that your experience was not as great as we would have liked. We take bad reviews very seriously, and we would like to ensure that your experience is better next time.

name: Shondrea Cook
text: Love Vital Smiles for being multi-kid friendly,  however,  I feel the check in system could improve. Maybe off an online portal to update information prior to visit instead of having to physically fill out paper work. For the parent with multiples, this would alleviate unwanted anxiety of the child not being called back at their scheduled appointment time. It would also help, if all children of the same family finish together. Other than that, service is great, staff is friendly and knowledgeable!

text: Vital Smiles is a great place to take your children for their dental needs. The place has warm and caring associates from the front desk to the back dental room. Always a great experience. Lily

text:
Front office staff is nice, and that's important as they are the 1st people you see when you arrive. Doctors and Hygienist are extremely patient and nice.

My son no cavities 6 years.
They are a trustworthy company/place. I appreciate their work.

name: Melody R
text: We used to like going here, never really had any problems. Of course there has always been a nice wait time but we decided to continue going there despite waiting a while to be seen. But this last time really made us change our mind. We have 3 children to receive updates on as they are being seen. As I sit down near my youngest daughter, and reach for my phone her hygienist tells me I have to leave because I have my phone out. I'm shocked, because I had just taken my phone out to return a text from my husband  as he wanted to know how the appointments were going. She would not continue my daughter's appointment until she escorted me out of the area. Now I completely understand businesses asking for cell phones to be turned on silent but to tell me that I cannot use my phone AT ALL is completely absurd! I have taken time from my off day to come to this business to bring my children and you're telling me I have to go to a consultation room just to use my phone.  I have already driven 30 minutes to come from my side of town, I  could have easily changed them to a Dr less than 5 minutes from home and had little to no wait time. In addition to all this, I'm trying to get information on my best friend who is in the ICU and no one knows what's going on because I can't use my phone to get the messages. Someone must have notified the manager because she came to talk, but she wanted to do it around my children and that was not going to happen. She should have asked to step away and then we could have talked.......... In other news, we won't be going  back.

name: Nakiria jackson
text: I saw this dentist several years ago and I did not remember why I wasn't going to go back. I went in today for a cleaning and the minute he walked in the room I was reminded why I will never visit this office again. He is impolite, insensitive, and can't relate to me effectively. The ladies at the front desk are very nice and professional and so is the lady that cleaned my teeth. Needless to say I will never give him my business again.

name: Brian
text: I've been going to see Dr. Walker since I was 18. I'm 47 now. He's a very nice guy and knows his profession very well. I feel like I'm visiting family when I go there. Everyone is very nice to me and always answers any questions I may have. If you wanna keep your teeth looking good and feel comfortable doing it then go see Dr. Walker and his great staff.

name: Cortney Moon
text: Dr. Walker was absolutely amazing!  I have a true fear of the dentist and he and his staff made me feel very comfortable.  I would highly recommend him to anyone.

name: AJS Williams
text: Dr. Walker was absolutely great with my daughter, was so nervous and she said she couldn't even feel the shot. Girl up front was so patient with my insurance. No other place would try to help me with a estimate or take our brand. We will definitely be back to that office.

name: Melissa Crusoe
text: Dr. Walker is the best dentist I have had! He is very professional and knows his craft well! AND his staff is professional and very skilled! I highly recommend Dr. Thomas Walker's Dentristy for all your dentistry needs!

name: Richard Howell
text: Staff is incompetent and severly lacking in training. Worst dentist office I have ever been to. I am 58 yrs old and have had a lot of dental work done. These people don't have a clue about what they are doing. They will lie and make up things in an attempt to cover up their incompetence. Don't waste your money. Save yourself a lot of pain and definitely avoid this office.

name: Brittany Richards
text: Dr. Walker has been my dentist since I was a child. I'm almost positive he worked on my first tooth! Even as a kid I felt comfortable and loved him as my dentist. As an adult, I feel the exact same and have always been extremely loyal to Dr. Walker. His office is always clean, my visit is always fast and his staff are always wonderful to talk with. He moved from Irondale (originally up on the hill) to Trussville (closer to me so that's a win!) and I'd follow him again. My entire family uses Dr. Walker and I highly recommend him as a dentist for patients of any age. He's the reason I have the awesome smile I do! :)

name: Kathryn Lopresti
text: Friendly and experienced employees. They become like family after a few cleanings or dental work. I have seen Dr Walker over 15 years.

text: Great atmosphere!! Very clean and patient oriented office..

text: Very professional, calming and very thorough

text: The staff is amazing!!!!!!!!! Great experience they were very helpful and made me feel right at home  ! I will be back!!!!!!!

name: Mindy Lambert
text: I would highly recommend!!!

name: Matt Stearns
text: Dr. Beitel and his staff make each visit pleasant and enjoyable while providing quality and professional care. Their process for bringing patients in and attending to them is top notch. I will never take my daughter anywhere else.

name: NICOLE DUNN
text: We Love, Love, love this dentist for our children. DR. Beitel is amazing. Friendly staff, clean waiting room and toys for kids to play while waiting. We started here when my oldest was 5 and never would change.

name: Annie Burwell
text: My 5 year old son had the BEST experience. He is a very energetic child and Dr. Beitel and his staff answered all his questions and were very patient. Thank you for caring!!!

name: Jenny Robinson
text: Dr. Bietel is the best dentist and has such a way with children. He took care of my son from day 1, and when the time came to put him under anesthesia to get his dental work done Dr. Bietel was phenomenal. He gave us his phone number and asked for us to follow up on how my son was doing. Dr. Bietel also answered any question I had. He made all of us feel comfortable and made my son’s mouth look beautiful! I trust him 100%, and that is saying a lot! We all love him! His office staff is also friendly and helpful.

name: Madison Steele
text: Had 2 appointments scheduled for my boys (4 & 6). My 6 year old had a blast!! Got X Rays loves the attention from all the staff everyone is extremely sweet !! My 4 year old is terrified to hear the word dentist the staff was helpful and encouraging and when it was obvious he was just not having it no one pushed or even seemed disappointed!! The Dr. came by checked him sitting in my lap let him hold the tools and kept it light and fun for him!!

name: Christina Bradford
text: My 4yo daughter had pretty bad anxiety when trying to get a filling at our normal family dentist so they referred us to Beitel. We could not be more pleased with our experience! The hygienist and the dentist spoke to my daughter through the whole process and let her touch everything she was curious about. They gave her options and let her feel like she had a say in what was happening. They praised her for her bravery and she left feeling like a champ! After leaving she said, “I love that dentist! That was fun!” And of course her Mr. Nose is sitting as a trophy by her bed now!

name: Christen Roth
text: We had a perfect checkup, as always. Our hygienist did a great job of explaining everything she was doing to keep my type A daughter calm, aware, and engaged. And thanks to Dr. Beitel’s skill and speed, even my wild child son had an excellent first exam!

name: Courtney Wells
text: We love Beitel Pedatric Dentistry! Our son looks forward to going for weeks before his appointment and leaves smiling and so happy! The staff there is amazing with children and they take time to explain to the kids what’s happening before anything is done. We especially love Brandi, she’s so good with all the kids! I recommend them to every mama I know!

name: Jason & April
text: This office works very well with special needs children. They are so patient and kind to work with my son who is autistic with sensory sensitivities. Very thankful to have found such a professional and compassionate pediatric dentistry!

name: Heather Ellenburg
text: I wish every child could be cared for by Beitel Pediatric Dentistry. Dr. Beitel has long been my hero for all the energy and care he gives children. He and his staff are wonderful!

name: NANCY STUART
text: Dr. Beitel and staff are so kind to my son. He enjoys going there. Everything is done with the well being of my son in mind. Dr. Beitel is an amazing doctor.

name: Kristin Woody
text: My son had his very first dentist appointment just a few days ago and it was such a great experience. The staff is very professional and friendly, very interactive with my son. He was so excited seeing all the tools they used and he loved picking out his own toothbrush.

name: Lizet Barrett
text: Wonderful place for my little girls. They always come out happy. Place is very clean. The staff very friendly and patient. Doctor Beitel is awesome with kids. I can’t be happier with this dental clinic.

name: Jenny Ingram
text: Everyone was so friendly and efficient! Loved Dr. Beitl. She was so experienced and knew exactly what she was doing. I hope my son comes to like going to the dentist!

name: Kymberly Price
text: Dr Beitel was so gentle with Breanna Best she didn't feel anything when he pulled her 4 teeth today . You can tell he really cares about his kids

name: Andrew Yarbrough
text: It was our 17 month old grandsons first trip to the dentist. Dr Caroline and Dr Beitel made it a very pleasant experience! They could not have been nicer or more professional. Dr Caroline took her time explaining what she was going to do and let our grandson touch her gloves and instruments before they touched him. He left with a sticker and a toy and I left with a lot of gratitude for his first impression of going to the dentist.

name: Kristina Allen
text: Dr. Beitel and all the staff are so amazing! They always put my kids at ease and make going to the dentist fun and stress free for the whole family!

name: URIAH STALLWORTH
text: Awesome staff! My 10 year old son used to hate going to the dentist before moving to Huntsville.  He is always excited to go now because everyone is so nice. We have been attending this dental office over 3 years now, and the patient care experience is always wonderful.

name: Stephanie Waggett
text: Dr Beitel and his staff are WONDERFUL!! The way they are with these kids is absolutely remarkable. We would highly recommend them to anyone and everyone with Children

name: Lisabeth Wiles
text: All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. They were very good at helping my 18 month old through his first dental visit.

name: Keisha Jordan
text: My children have been patients of Dr. Beitel’s for about 10 years. I love that he always addresses parents by their name. He is amazing with children, makes them feel comfortable. His staff is also A+ always a great experience.

name: Jean Graham
text: The staff is very nice and great with helping get nervous children calmed down! The doctors are wonderful as well!

name: preethi srinivasan
text: Highly recommend this clinic.Both Dr Brain and Dr Caroline Beitel are awesome and so are their staff.

name: Jessica Ellis
text: We love the Dr. Beitel’s!! They are the best dentists around! They really care about every patient!!

name: Amy Clark
text: Always the best experience. My kids love going to see Dr. Beitel. They love to see him try to toss paper towels into the trashcan from across the room or what funny thing he is going to ask them as he is examining their teeth.

name: Meghan Medlen
text: The entire staff did a great job making our first dentist appointment fun and comfortable!

name: Brandon Reeves
text: Every visit is exceptional. I drive a little over an hour one way to take my son here. I’d drive farther.

name: Katelyn Palmer
text: My daughter recently had to get some dental work done. She is 4 so is easily shaken. We have always loved Dr. Beitel but while at the hospital he went above and beyond to make sure I was updated while I couldn’t be with her, then gave his personal cell phone number to me to make sure I updated him on how she was feeling later in the day. That makes the difference! He truly cares about his patients!

name: Paula Mintzer
text: My kids love Dr Beitel, and until lately I would give more than 5 stars if I could. Now it is almost impossible to get an appointment. The next available is over 4 months away for an established patient, and that’s entirely too long. Hopefully that will improve. If not we will probably look for another dentist.

name: Paul Broadwater
text: They are very good with children.  My most pain sensitive child needed several fillings.  They made her comfortable and she did great.

name: Haley Loveday
text: This was my daughter's first dentistry appointment and everyone we encountered was so sweet and patient with her and made her feel completely at ease. They were very Covid conscious and checked temps as soon as we walked in and had hand sanitizer at the ready. I am so happy that we chose Beitel Pediatric Dentistry and look forward to many more years of satisfaction. THANK YOU!

name: nithda kiengkham
text: I have been taking my daughter(who is now 8) to Dr. Beitel since she was 2 years old and I have never had a bad experience with them. They are absolutely amazing and my daughter has not once been scared to go to the dentist. She actually gets excited and To me that says a lot!

name: Rebeka Fout
text: It is a great dentist to take your children. Everyone is very nice.

name: Robin Blankenship
text: The dentists, hygienists, and staff are the best! My son has Down Syndrome and they are amazing with him!

name: Amanda Cantrell
text: Dr Beitel is a rare find in a dentist....I've never before met someone who can calm anxious hearts and brings smiles out of potentially scary events for kids.   Dr Beitel is an AMAZING dentist...but also an AMAZING, caring, overall wonderful person.    You won't find anyone more genuine than him when it comes to caring for, and treating kids.   He really does make coming to the dentist a fun overall experience for all of my kiddos.   His staff also goes above and beyond , each and every time.   We are definitely blessed to have such a wonderful dental office looking after our littles!

name: Marissa Nguyen
text: Super friendly staff! Was gentle with my 6 year old as her adult molars were coming in! Definitely going to Dr. Beitel for her cleanings!

name: Keith Ferrara
text: Fantastic Practice.  We just moved to Huntsville and I’m very happy with our decision for our 5 year old!

name: Roz You
text: Dr. Beitel and staff are very friendly and caring. Very competent in handling children esp. With a toddler like mine. Always gives great advice and recommendations.

name: Marissa Nguyen
text: Super friendly staff! Was gentle with my 6 year old as her adult molars were coming in! Definitely going to Dr. Beitel for her cleanings!

name: Trudy Moore
text: The absolute best Pediatric Dentist and staff in the area!! My children are always asking when do they get to go back!! 😍

name: Heather Lindsey
text: Beitel Pediatric Dentistry deserves 5 stars! From the moment we walked in the door every person we came into contact was friendly and welcoming. The hygienist walked my girls through every step of the cleaning process while making it fun and entertaining. We saw Dr. Beitel and Dr. Caroline. They were both so good with the girls. They explained everything about their visit to me in a way I understood. My girls felt totally at ease during the entire visit! I would recommend them to everyone! Thank you for a great visit!

name: Lacinda Woodall
text: We have three kids, the oldest of whom is 26, so we have been going to Dr. Beitel for somewhere around 25 years. Not once have we ever had a bad experience. Dr. Beitel is fantastic with both the kids and the parents!  He is extremely knowledgeable of his profession, but is also very personable. We always come out of the dentist’s office with a smile from something goofy he did or said during the visit!  His office personnel is friendly and very helpful. We are excited to get to know his daughter as she is coming into the practice with him, as well. You will not be disappointed if you give them a try!  We love Beitel Pediatric Dentistry!

name: Kameron Peterson
text: I took my son, Olyver, to Dr. Beitel this morning, and we had a wonderful experience! Brandi made Olyver feel extremely comfortable, and she really took her time with him to make it a fun experience at the dentist! I would recommend to everyone to take your kid to see this dentist and his team!

name: Carleen Barker
text: When we first moved to this area, a coworker recommended Dr. Beitel. I'm so glad we were referred because Dr. Beitel and his staff are amazing! Very good communication and very friendly. Thank you for all you do!

name: Sarah McLain
text: Dr. Beitel is such an amazing pediatric dentist! His staff are amazing and so friendly. My son had to get fillings and he talked to him to make him feel more comfortable. Not once did he know that he was getting numbing put in his gums because they never let the kids see the needle. They have a "Mr. Nose" mask that sits on his nose giving him nitrous, so that way he doesn't feel the shot. My son always loves going and they are so amazing with all children.

name: Heather Brock
text: Dr. Beitel has always taken great care of my children's teeth, and all of his staff is wonderful to work with . He has worked hand in hand with our orthodontist to provide any early treatment to assist in providing the best possible outcome for their smiles. The atmosphere is calm but cheerful, and you can tell they really do care about your kids. Anytime I have ever had a question, their staff has been easy to reach and extremely helpful.

name: Tiffany Smith
text: The staff were so amazing with our three children. They were laughing and so excited to tell me about their experiences. They were thorough and explained the details of each child's dental needs. We are so happy with our choice!

name: Baylee Tiffin
text: I’ve been driving my children to Huntsville from the Shoals area for a few years now to see Dr. Beitel & his staff because they are the ABSOLUTE best! Their facility is always kept clean & in order.  My kids used to dread dentist appointments, but ever since switching to Dr. Beitel, they look forward to their appointments!! 5 stars and couldn’t recommend a better pediatric Dentist!

name: Baylee Tiffin
text: I’ve been driving my children to Huntsville from the Shoals area for a few years now to see Dr. Beitel & his staff because they are the ABSOLUTE best! Their facility is always kept clean & in order.  My kids used to dread dentist appointments, but ever since switching to Dr. Beitel, they look forward to their appointments!! 5 stars and couldn’t recommend a better pediatric Dentist!

name: Josie Lane
text: We had such a great visit! My 4 year old was too scared to let anyone look at her teeth at her first checkup, 6 months ago. The people at Beitel had this on her chart and took extra care with her, making her laugh and relax. It went great, they did a wonderful job with my 5 year old as well and were SO patient while I wrangled an 18 month old during the visit. Highly recommend.

name: Natalie Jones
text: Dr. Beitel and his office are the BEST!  Had another great experience with him yesterday.  My daughter had a previous traumatic filling experience with a different dentist and was so anxious.  He and his assistant talked her through the whole process, made sure she was extremely comfortable, and ended up doing an extraction without her even realizing it—or being upset at all!  Thank you, Dr. Beitel!!

name: Jennifer Tucker
text: It is always a wonderful visit with Dr Beitel and his crew ! They are fantastic! It’s peaceful and my kids love to visit .

name: Shanen Cottingham
text: So blessed by Dr. Beital and his amazing staff. My kids enjoy going to the dentist and seeing them. Very thorough and great communication with me and the kids. Highly recommend

name: Susi Bowermaster
text: I absolutely love taking my child to this dental practice. They are amazing with children and you can tell they truly enjoy what they are doing and care about the people they service.

name: Samantha C
text: Dr. Taylor and Karina, the dental hygienist, were amazing with my 3 year old daughter! Karina introduces her to all the instruments and let her touch them and get acquainted before suggesting to clean her teeth. I was impressed, my daughter let her teeth get cleaned and mouth inspected. I strongly recommend Dr. Beitel’s office.

name: Linsey Lee
text: I've been going to Dr. Beitel for years and have always had great experiences. It makes going to the dentist fun and easy for kids that might be scared and the staff is always the sweetest. Dr. Beitel's office is one of the best in Huntsville and I'd recommend it to anyone with kids of all ages.

name: Levore Arenz
text: Love Dr. Beitel and his staff. They are very kid friendly. Would definitely recommend them to anyone who's looking for a pediatric dentist.

name: Amber Blevins
text: If your looking for an amazing dentist for your children look no further!!! I bring both my boys to see Dr. Beitel and I am never disappointed. Not only is the staff absolutely amazing (Anna their hygienist is top notch!!) in making my kids calm but the over all experience is fantastic.  I was not waiting long at all. Highly recommend!!!

name: Megan Roberts
text: Have been going to Dr. Beitel for 15+ years and have always been satisfied with the care I received. They are kind and very knowledgeable. His daughter made a wonderful addition to the team! Would recommend them to anyone needing a dentist.

name: Nickie Buchannon
text: I have been pleased with coming here for my child. They have been extremely patient with her and very kind.

name: Jayna Talley
text: Love Dr Beitel Pediatric Dentistry. My daughter see's Dr. Caroline and loves her. I would definitely recommend them!

name: Eleasa Wilson
text: Love this place. So clean. Such sweet people. Always a pleasure. Thank you!

name: Amber Horton Kinch
text: We love Beitel Ped Dentistry!  Great experience and care!!

name: Jennifer Douglas
text: Best dentist! He was my dentist as a kid and now he is my kids dentist. When my son’s gum swelled with fluid (there is a fancy name for it) while his molar was trying to come in he took care of it, and even called the next day to check on him.

name: Anna Key
text: We love every staff member at Beitel Pediatric Denistry! They all take time to talk to the little ones who admire them so much. We won’t go anywhere else!

name: Mike and Amy McWilliams
text: Everyone is always so friendly and makes going to the dentist much less scary for my three year old. Dr. Beitel is wonderful and always makes my little one smile!

name: JB Mena
text: The most fun my girls have ever had at the dentist. Wonderful staff and truly kid friendly

name: Tykeya Jones
text: Dr. Beitel is amazing! He always make my kids feel calm and not scared. He even got my 14 month old to lay down and let him look at his teeth.

name: Amanda Dison
text: I absolutely loved Beitel Pediatric Dentistry. I brought my 2 year old here for her very first dentist appointment and she loved getting her "teeth tickled." She enjoyed meeting all of the doctors and dental hygienists. They were all very nice and made her feel comfortable.

name: Jessica Stroud
text: Amazing! Staff and Dr. Caroline are so friendly and work amazing with my 23 month old. We loved our nurse Anna too! :)

name: Chloe Wilson
text: What a wonderful practice! I took my son for his first dentist appointment and the entire experience was great. All of the staff is so friendly and fun and the dentists are great! I am so glad we picked this practice.

name: Laura Fallon
text: Everyone was awesome with my 3 children today!  Very patient and sweet! Thank you so much for a wonderful first visit!

name: Melissa Derrick
text: They are awesome here from start to finish! Dr. Beitel is amazing with children. She’s so patient and her calm demeanor puts my little boys at ease. I would highly recommend using their office.

name: Jamey Shelden
text: Low wait time and VERY friendly staff! All of the staff were great with my son and made him feel comfortable! They also explained everything to us both. I highly recommend them!

name: Barbara Gillespie
text: Great care, as always. We love Dr. Beitel and his staff. They took extra precautions to keep visits safe.

name: Elizabeth Fletcher
text: Our little kids love going here! They are amazing and super nice. My 5 year old son talks about going to the dentist for weeks before going and weeks after.

name: Mark Ratliff
text: Awesome Docs, awesome staff!  Wouldn’t go anywhere else.

name: Amy Turner
text: Dr. Beitel and his staff are amazing!!! They are always so nice and explain everything! They never hesitate to answer in questions! My grandson loves how great they are to him!!

name: Sarah Ashley
text: We have a child with a complicated medical history need extensive dental work in the hospital.  Both doctors have gone above and beyond making sure we understood and he was feeling ok afterwards and we didn’t have any problems or concerns.

name: Matt Stearns
text: I couldn't imaging taking my daughter anywhere else.  The service is always top-notch and professional. They have state of the art equipment with a well lit and organized patient area.  The atmosphere is pleasant and enjoyable.  The personalities of the current father-daughter duo,  Dr. Brian and Dr. Caroline,  make for a fun visit.  I wish I could get my teeth cleaned there!

name: Liz Smith
text: My kids were very anxious for their dentist appointment but Miss Corina did an amazing job making them as comfortable as possible.  They gave great feed back and weren't pushy at all.

name: Krista Casper
text:
I think it was about 10 years ago my son became a patient at Beitel Pediatric Dentistry and we have NOT regretted that decision. Dr. Brian Beitel is so professional but so funny! He makes you feel like your a part of the family!
Recently his daughter Caroline came into the practice and has been WONDERFUL to work with as well. She is so caring and deals BEAUTIFULLY with anxious patients.
HIGHLY recommend!

name: Leah Crouse
text: I highly recommend Dr. Beitel and his staff. He was my dentist as a teen and now he is taking care of my girls. It is always a pleasant experience in his office. He is kind, informative, and proactive about your child’s dental health. It is clear that their office is taking the current situation seriously. During my girls’ cleanings their were many extra precautions taken to ensure everyone’s safety. Thank you Dr. Beitel!

name: Lauren Battle
text: Very caring, professional staff that are great with small children. Highly recommend!

name: Dana Rogers
text: Absolutely love Dr. Beitel and his staff. Have been using them for a few years now and wouldn’t go anywhere else! Highly recommend!!!

name: Stephanie Lovelady
text: Dr Beitel and his staff are absolutely amazing. I highly recommend them.

name: Nikki Elliott
text: Loved the care they give to my son during visits. Especially LOVED the care taken during cavities.

name: Jorda Cruz
text: Great atmosphere, great employees, and accommodating to family. Thank you for all that you do.

name: Alison Lovelace
text:
I cannot rave enough about the wonderful experience we had at our appointment!

My son has been to a different dentist before, but this was his first visit here, and his first real cleaning so I was a little nervous.  From beginning to end everyone was so kind and genuinely seemed to care about children.  Loved our hygienist, Hannah, she was so warm and talked my son through everything, and Dr. Beitel was a perfect mix of thorough and fun all at the same time.  So happy we found them and look forward to our visits to come!

name: Andrea Henson
text: Both of my kids go to Beitel Pediatric Dentistry and we absolutely love them. The entire staff is always so friendly and helpful.

name: Kelly Watson
text: All 5 of my kids get so excited when they know it’s time for their appointments and we absolutely love BOTH Dr. Beitels! So blessed to have found this office when we moved here years ago!

name: Ashlee Ciesielski
text: My oldest child has been going to Dr. Beitel’s office for more than 5 years. My youngest is almost 3 and has now been twice. They both absolutely love both doctors and every single staff member. My oldest is often anxious about new people and environments and the doctors and staff have always made him feel at ease. They both look forward to going to the dentist! We cannot say enough positive things about Doctor Beitel and the staff!

name: Savannah A
text: I love Dr. Beitel and his daughter. The dental assistants also. My 3 year old asks me when he can go back to the dentist. Also they do great with my 1 year old. Beat pediatric dentists I have ever seen.

name: Maria Kaa
text: Beyond expectations. Should be more than 5 stars. From the greeters and nurses to the Dr. This was my daughter's first and follow up appointment and it was excellent. Highly recommended.

name: Sara Webb
text: I have been going to this dentist office for the last three years. Last year I moved to Madsion and decided to try a dentist closer to the house. One visit elsewhere made my kids and I quickly realize how much we absolutely love Dr. Beitel and his team! So even though a little drive, we went back and are totally satisfied once again! Hands down best dentist I have ever come across! Wish he saw adults. Lol

name: Stephen Sparkman
text:
Beitel Pediatric Dentistry is an amazing establishment. They have consistently been caring with a toddler that does not like things in their mouth.

They have done a wonderful job, and even taught us a few techniques to insure a healthy dental life for our growing child.

name: Carla Burns
text: Dr. Beitel and staff are always awesome.... very friendly and helpful every visit!

name: Andy jones
text: Dr. Beitel is great with kids. Nice clean office. Very friendly staff and hygienists. Lots of specials touches just for kids. Colored sunglasses for the kids to wear during cleaning and always some stickers and little toys that the kids enjoy.

name: Stacey Hall
text: Husband’s dentist from when he was a child took our son there , still the great dentist he knew from years ago !

name: Shelley Barnes
text: Best pediatric dental experience ever!!

name: Melissa Parry
text: Dr Beitel does a wonderful job with the kids! He takes plenty of time to talk to them and play with them so they feel comfortable with him before he looks at their teeth. He schedules extra time for kids who are a little bit anxious. When my son wasn't able to hold the xray piece in his mouth, they didn't force it. They just switched to a different kind of xray instead. This is our first time going to a pediatric dentist and there are many thoughtful little details that make a big difference. My kids are 2, 4, and 7 and we've all had great experiences there!

name: Chris Green
text: Dr. Beitel was wonderful! He did an amazing job to comfort my 4 year old. Highly recommended.

name: Melissa Williams
text: Staff is ALWAYS professional. I completely trust Dr. B and Caroline with my children! They are knowledgeable, quick, efficient with a great staff. My kids LOVE going to the dentist!!!!!

name: Susan Lewis
text: I went to Dr. Beitel as a child, now I take my son to him. I can’t imagine a better pediatric dentist! He is so fun and cool, my son loves him. Everyone who works there is GREAT with kids and knows how to put them at ease and have fun with them. I absolutely recommend Dr. Beitel to everyone!

name: Melissa Clark
text: They are absolutely amazing with my son! Very friendly I highly recommended Dr. Beitel and his team!

name: Alicia Hilton-Gaskin
text: We love Dr. Beitel and his staff! They are always kind and patient with my kids.

name: natalie kosechata
text: the office is very nice. we had to wait outside for our appointment.. we were asked to come 15mon early so we did. about 45min of waiting outside in the 95 degree heat my daughter was stung in the face by a bee.. she is 2.. after calling them and letting them know what had happened they let us wait the remaining 30min wait in the lobby... after waiting an hr and 15min yo get called back we met a very sweet lady who play with my daughter for a bit. the doctor came. he is amazing... did great with my daughter and was very happy to answer all my questions! the 3hrs dental appt was worth it to me. i am sure this covid has not been easy to deal with from their point a view. over all happy!!

name: Lillian Couey
text: Our dentist very recently retired. Christian, our 10 year old son and 100% all adventurous boy, was riding moving dolly's on our concrete driveway.  He smacked his mouth on the concrete putting a great triangle chip in one of his front teeth. We were stressed trying to find a new dentist. As I was reaching out to friends, family and acquaintances for help Dr. Beitel's name kept frequently coming up. My husband called our pediatrician asking about Dr.Beitel and the staff called back telling us they loved him.  Dr. Beitel's office was so helpful, courteous and caring from the moment I called. They were so very understanding of  the situation we found ourselves in with a retired dentist, our sons accident and no dentist. They got Christian in that morning to see Dr. Beitel. Brandy, the dental assistant was so good and caring with him and really made Christian feel very comfortable. Dr. Caroline Beitel, Dr. Beitle's daughter, was the dentist who took care of Christian. She was very patient and kind with Christian and was able to also repair the tooth that day. Dr. Caroline was courteous toward the support staff and she and Brandy worked together well as a team. They both kept talking and cutting up with Christian. Honestly my son was so happy with them that he kept telling everyone after we left how great those two ladies were. Needless to say my husband and I think they are great and both our sons have found a great new father daughter team who are great with kids. Five stars from us and our son.

name: Kate Hammond
text: We love everything about Beitel Pediatric Dentistry! They are personable, patient, and make things fun for the kids! My daughter is always asking when her next appointment is 😊

name: Natalia Comsa McInnish
text: Friendly staff and timely manner of delivering services.

name: Adam Stults
text: Incredible place to take your kids! They are always so friendly and put my kids at ease. I highly recommend.

name: Elizabeth Schwarze
text: Staff is always very attentive and caring. Office is very professional and clean. My daughter loves going to the dentist!

name: Britt Carr
text: I love Dr. Beitel and his staff. It’s always super busy but they are a well oiled machine. We never really have a long wait (we love first thing in the morning appointments), we are in and out. My kids love how silly Dr. Beitel is and they are never scared of the dentist. They always say how much they love him!

name: Lisa Pendergrass
text: We could not ask for a more caring group of people. They have accommodated us in dental emergencies, and are always patient and professional.

name: Samantha Clark
text: Dr. Beitel and his staff are the best. I'll never take my daughter anywhere else.

name: Hilary Petty
text: We love going to see Dr. Beital! The whole staff is so accommodating.

name: Karen Barry
text: Super friendly staff, nice office, both kids got a cleaning and checkup from the dentist in less than 45 minutes.

name: Stephen R
text: This is my 5 year olds third dentist in the past 6 months and finally we found someone who can make him comfortable and get through the procedures without sedation!  I can't believe it. Highly recommend Dr. Beitel! Very calm, funny and disarming with my son.

name: Ashley Wisby
text: I went here as a kid & now my 2 boys get to experience this. Doctor Beitel is so wonderful & makes the visits very fun. I recommend him to anyone. Thanks for everything you do! (:

name: Debra Fuller
text: Staff was incredible with my toddler. Dr. Beitel was made for working in pediatric dentistry as he was very patient and tried to make the experience as stress-free as possible.

name: Terrence Abrams
text: Dr. Beitel is a really great Dentist. He makes the experience really enjoyable for both my young children.  I would definitely recommend this office to anyone looking for a pediatric dentist.

name: Heather Green
text: I was recommended by my pediatrician to bring my son here. I took him for his first appointment and they did such a great job! All of the staff was friendly. The wait time was about normal for any doctor visit. They talked through what they were going to do so my son had clear idea of what was going on. Dr. Beitel took the time not only to tell me what we could improve on but also the things we were doing well on.

name: Tamela Slaten
text: At Beitel Ped. Dentistry they have a very friendly atmosphere with the children.

name: Tara Harding
text: Dr. Beitel is GREAT with kids! Always a super fun visit!

name: D Nord
text: Dr Brian Beitel and now his daughter Dr Caroline Beitel, are wonderful. Our three children have been patients of Dr. Beitel for 18 years now and the care is always consistent and thorough. As a pediatrician, I am always referring patients to Drs. Beitel without reservation.

name: S Scruggs
text: I truly believe in pediatric dentistry and the Beitels are one of the best, I think it's worth every penny that we spend to go here!

name: Sara Coble
text: This has been my dentist for the majority of my life. They’ve always been tactful and helpful in my maintenance of good oral health over the years. It’s really sad that in just a couple years, I’ll have to start going to an adult dentist.

name: emily clark
text: We always receive the best care from the front desk to the cleaning chair. We love the Beitels’!

name: Ashley Purandare
text: We love Dr Beitel! I saw him when I was a kid and now my 2kids go there.

name: Misty Brimhall
text: My son has sensory issues- the staff & Dr’s were so quick and made things as easy as possible!

name: Robin Smith
text: My two children have gone to Dr. Beitel for the past 20 years - he's the best dentist in Huntsville, AL!

name: Patrick Williams
text: I cannot imagine taking C anywhere else! This is truly a group of amazing, loving and caring people.

name: Tina Leberte
text: Best Pediatric Dentist in Huntsville!  My children have been patients since 2001.

name: Kyong Roberts
text: We LOVE Dr. Beitel and his staff. Very friendly and always professional. My kids always look forward to his seeing him and going to the dentist

name: Heather Thompson
text: Our 10 year old has been a patient at Beitel Pediatric Dentistry since he got his first tooth! We love this practice and when your son doesn't mind going to the dentist, that's a good thing 😊😊

name: Amanda Lovelace-tobicash
text: They were fantastic with the kids and handled social distancing perfectly.

name: Devin Chivers
text: Super friendly and fast! My kids love going to Dr. Beitel!

name: Tabatha Mcgee
text: Another lovely visit today! I have 4 daughters and they all love everyone here.

name: Julie Denton
text: My 6 year old had a great experience this morning having a cavity filled.  Dr. Beital & Brandi made her feel completely comfortable and at ease.  She was seen in a timely manner and the filling only took about 10 minutes.  Dr. Brian certainly uses his giftedness to make sure children have a positive experience while seeing the dentist!

name: Marina Wethington
text: Very friendly and patient staff. They make going to the dentist a fun experience!

name: William Latta
text: Dr. Beitel is great and his daughter who is now a dentist there is great. However, you get there and the dental hygienist takes like 10-15 mins to do their cleaning, but then your sitting there waiting for like an hour for the dentist to come around. BE PREPARED TO WAIT!!!

name: No One
text: The best pediatric dentist in Alabama. Not even close.

name: Melanie Haynes
text: I couldnt have asked for a better experience for my son. The dr tried his hardest to get brax to cooperate with him. And he is willing to try again under diff circumstances. Thank u so much for being so patient with us.

name: Daphne Arthur
text: Dr.C Beitel is amazing! My kiddo has severe dental anxiety and Dr.Beitel has done a great job helping manage her anxiety and making sure she gets the dental care she needs.

name: Tabitha Allen
text:
I was searching for a dentist who is patient, funny, kind, caring, and good with kids because I have a 5 year old daughter and 2 year old daughter who mean the absolute world to me. I am so incredibly thankful we found Dr Beitel after asking for references on Facebook and several people referring him to me!! He is so good with kids! He makes them feel comfortable! He makes my 2 girls laugh by playing with some of the dentist tools and blowing up a latex glove and just all around “having a good time!” Because lets be real the dentist office isn’t the most fun place for kids to go!! Kids pick up on people’s personalities quick. They are good at reading people and reading peoples vibes, Dr Beitel has great vibes and my girls picked up on it! His staff is super sweet. My friend Hannah that works there also referred us there and helped us get in there so we are always glad to see her when we go for 6 month cleanings! My older daughter who is 5 had to have 2 fillings on her 2 front teeth about 8 months ago, one tooth was chipped a little bit, but other than that we haven’t had to have any other work done on their teeth, and they had no cavities at their recent check up/cleaning😊 I was terrified for my daughter to have those two fillings done
and so was she. It’s something I hope we don’t have to do often or ever again so we BRUSH BRUSH BRUSH & FLOSS FLOSS FLOSS, but Dr Beitel did a FANTASTIC job at making her feel safe and he made her 2 front teeth look amazing, like they never had a cavity and like that one was never even chipped. I wish I had a before and after picture, because he did great! I’m sure he's done much bigger things that are also amazing but I wasn’t expecting for her two front teeth to look that good. Both of my girls still have all of their baby teeth, but we look forward to seeing Dr Beitel and his daughter for many many many more years to come!! We have only saw his daughter once, at our recent 6 month cleaning, and she was very nice! Last time I wrote a review this long I jinxed myself lol, so let’s hope everything continues to great with Dr Brian Beitel :)

name: Troy Hughes
text: Great staff.

name: Stacie Haney
text: The wait time is always 2hrs long and the front office lady never knows what’s going on and not very helpful. My son felt uncomfortable when he rubbed my sons stomach and so did I. I just didn’t feel great taking my children and won’t be back. They are also more expensive than APDA (which are so amazing and fast). We will be going back to them from now on! The dental hygienist were great though!

name: Debbie L Mitchell
text: Dr. Beitel is the best!  He's really good at working with kids who were traumatized by other dentists.  We've had several over the years, the last two were 2 & 4.  After 2 visits with Dr. Beitel they now BOTH look forward to going to the dentist!  Great staff, too.  :-)

name: Krista Trotter
text: BEST EXPERIENCE EVER!  Dr Beitel was very kind and gentle and so understanding with our dental issues with our non verbal autistic son! The staff was very accommodating and made us very welcome! Thank you thank you thank you!

name: Briana Faulk
text: Amazing with kids!!

name: Adam Dyess
text: It's generally a fun visit to the Dentist's office.  The floor plan is very open, plenty of room for parents and siblings to wait.  The staff is kind and cheerful.

name: Melissa Sanders
text: Everybody there is wonderful!! My daughter is 6 and loves going to the dentist now!

name: Marsha Osborn
text: Love him! He takes awesome care of my autistic child. His staff is wonderful too!

name: Ashley Elmore
text: He is so good with the kids and parents both. His nurses are kind, quick, and thorough.

name: hale family
text: He is great with the kids, always makes them laugh. And worked wonders with my special needs son, who hates having anything in his mouth.

name: Melissa Potter
text: Every time we come here there is an incredibly long wait time. This is not an easy thing with a young child. Other than that the staff is friendly.

name: Albertina TOMASINO
text: We love Beitel Pediatric Dentistry Family!! Thank you for you Love, patience to my kids. Especially to my special need son ..    thank you . Tomasino Family .                                             Nosotros Queremos mucho a la familia Beitel Pediatric Dentistry y miembros que trabajan ahí . Ellos son muy Amables y tienen mucha paciencia. Siempre nos atienden con una sonrisa amable. Mis hijos se sienten muy bien con ellos. Muchas gracias por todo. Tomasino Familia!!!

name: Victoria Whitten
text: Double Oak Mountain Family Dentistry is by far the most welcoming dental practice I have ever visited! The whole entire staff from the front desk ladies Alecia, Tonya and Susan to my perfect hygienist, Kim and awesome doctors, Brewer and Samford, I will never go anywhere else! Anytime I have a question, the assistants, Jessica and Sara are always more than willing to help! These people are truly kind and go out of their way to make you feel comfortable and at home! I love this staff like family!

name: Lori Brewer
text: I have been going to Oak Mountain Family Dentistry for several years now and plan on going there for many years to come. The whole staff there is super nice and they always make me feel at home. I love how my sweet hygienist always remembers what’s going on in my life, even when I only see her two times a year. She’s the best! Dr. Brewer is also! He is so friendly and I always feel so comfortable, no matter what kind of work he’s doing on me. I have recommended and will continue to recommend OMFD to friends and family who are in need of dentistry services.

name: Timika Caldwell
text: Absolutely love the office staff and Dr. Brewer!  Dr. Brewer and his staff has serviced my family for the past 12 years.  They are all very efficient, friendly, and provide prompt and fast service.  Always feel like we are visiting family at every visit, from the moment we walk in and are greeted by the ladies at the front, to the hygienist, to sharing laughs with Dr. Brewer.  Always a pleasant visit!  Thank you all!

name: Carri Cook
text: I was very impressed with this office. From the moment I first spoke with them on the phone, they put me at ease. Everyone was extremely kind and compassionate. It definitely eased my fear. Am happy to have found them.

name: Caroline Jones
text: From the second you walk in the door, you are always greeted with a smile. The office is always efficient about getting you back & not making you wait too long. I like that they put you with the same hygienist each time because you build a relationship. Dr. Samford is always thorough & personable. Been using Double Oak for 17 years- I am always pleased with my experience!

resp.text: You've been a great patient for a long time! Thanks for your kind review. Look forward to seeing you at your next cleaning appt.

name: Lauren Lindberg
text: Great family practice with Dentists that have a conservative approach to dental treatments / procedures. The hygienists are professional and personable. Their staff is friendly and make scheduling a breeze.They’ve perfected a smooth entry/exit process that incorporates standard Covid-19 protocols. As a new patient, I had to fill out applications and provide my insurance details. It was an easy process that I was able to complete on my iPhone prior to my appointment.

name: Heather Cockrell
text: Love the entire staff! My family and I have been going to them for many years and have always had a great experience. Efficiently run, but in a warm, friendly environment.

name: Shannon Busby
text: Dr. Brewer at Oak Mountian Family dentistry is a dentist that I trust completely. I put my faith in him when it comes to my dental procedures. No one, I mean no one, has ever done a better job. Not only that but the staff at Oak Mountain Family is the kindest, most efficient, and knowledgeable I have ever come across. I highly recommend going there!

name: Maria Walker
text: Double Oak Mountain provided a 5 star dental experience. The office space was clean and organized. The staff was friendly and exhibited excellent customer care.

name: Sheri Anaforian
text: This was my second appointment with Dr. James Samford and Dental Hygienist, Brittney. Upon arrival, i was welcomed with a warm greeting from the front office staff. Brittney was so kind and very thorough with my cleaning, yet worked quickly. I then moved to another room where Dr. Samford put in a permanent filling to complete my root canal done at the Endodontic. Dr. Samford is very warm and calming. He cares for his patients, and takes time to listen to his patients concerns. He’s very skilled, with cutting edge dentistry. I’m very grateful for this wonderful staff and recommend Double Oak Family Dentistry to anyone looking for a family dental practice!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. Our ultimate goal is to deliver the best dental experience we can. We enjoyed having you in the office today and look forward to seeing you in the future.

name: Julie Holloway
text: This was the best experience of visiting a dental office I’ve had in many years. It had been several years since I’d had a teeth cleaning and the staff was very kind in every way. Front desk was super nice and took good safety precautions. I highly recommend giving this place a chance!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Julie. Our mission is to give patients the best dental experience possible!

text: My whole family absolutely loves this dentist office. From the dentist all the way to the office staff. Very sweet amd always greets me with a smile.

text: Dr Brewer is great and they do a great job of following covid safety. Great job, keep up the great work.

text: I absolutely loved this place! They were all very kind and explained everything so I’d understand the care I was receiving. Dr.Samford was awesome and did not hesitate when I said I wanted Clear Correct during my visit.

name: Lauren Mason
text: Staff is friendly and welcoming. Definitely trust them with my care.

name: David Mugg
text: Our former dentist was approaching retirement and we needed to find a new one. We have been pleased with the professional services thus far.

text: We moved to the Birmingham area right before Covid hit. We couldn't get back to our previous dentist for our regular dental checkup and it's been too long. We were directed to Double Oak Mtn and Dr. Brewer and I couldn't be happier. The online process for inputing my information couldn't be easier. Upon arrival the safety procedures were fantastic, along with a very helpful and friendly front office team. My hygienist, Taylor was very friendly, professional and detailed in her work (sorry if it was hard but it has been a year since my last cleaning). Dr. Brewer was friendly and professional and welcomed me to area. The facility is modern and 'first class'. My wife has an appointment here in April and she won't be disappointed.

name: LaBarron Lewis
text: My family and I have been clients for years.  The service is excellent and the staff is very friendly.

name: Libba Brink
text: They were quick, friendly, did a great job caring for my teeth, and very COVID cautious! My husband and I both felt confident in the care we received at Double Oak Mountain!

name: Mayelin Ricart

text: Friendly staff!  They took very good covid precautions!

text: As someone with serious anxiety about going to the dentist, I can say my first visit to this office was a walk in the park! I 100% recommend Double Oak Mountain for their kind staff, gentle touch and cheerful environment. I was also impressed by the safety measures they have put into place to ensure safe appointments during the COVID-19 pandemic.

name: Dina K
text: I would definitely recommend this practice! Very professional, quick, competent and friendly. I had to move back to Canada and miss them!

I would highly recommend this dental practice and specifically Dr. Samford for anyone seeking or looking for a new dentist.

I did notice they were extra careful during the pandemic with sanitation stations, temperature checks and masks.   Thanks fir taking care of me.

name: Jennifer Moreira Dinzey
text: Very friendly and professional personnel. The doctors actually ask you about your concerns and give you a plan for how your problems will be adressed. 100% recommend.

text:
I was referred to Dr. James Samford at Double Oak Mountain Family Dentistry by a friend and co worker. I had my inital visit today. WOW!!! The entire staff here is AMAZING!!! The ladies at the front desk were so friendly, knowledgeable, and helpful.

They called my insurance company before I even went back, to make sure which procedures were covered and which ones were not.

When I was finished, the staff at the front desk called another office that I needed to make an appointment for, and made the appointment for me.
Did I mention how AMAZING the entire staff was?

I'm sorry that I forgot everyone's names, but I won't forget how you made me feel welcome and valued. Thank you again!!!

text: Switched dentists because I was not satisfied with my previous provider and I could not be more happy with Dr. Samford and his staff.
